We have a little history with crowdfunding too.  Four years ago VSSL launched through Crowdfunding. At the time we knew nothing about digital marketing, or how to run a Kickstarter campaign. Fortunately, those early (and rough) versions of VSSL were well received. And despite a lot of bumps in the road, we had a successful product launch!  While the original VSSL was the distillation of Todd’s (VSSL’s founder) experience from his youth and as an outdoorsman, the all NEW VSSL Camp is everything the original VSSL was, with years of experience and feedback being poured into improving every component of our flagship product.  Over these last 4 years we’ve learned so much. We’ve made many improvements and the product quality is now world class. We’re proud to be launching VSSL Camp Supplies through crowdfunding and want to thank you for your support in helping us keep people prepared for outdoor adventure.

story:
We Are Shipping

* Earn 12% Cash Back by Helping Us Spread the Word. Besides, we offer Free Shipping Worldwide!

 

SUMMARY

As electronics get smaller, more sophisticated and cheaper, pinhole cameras are no longer exclusive to James Bond kind of secret agents or the law enforcement, but easily accessible to everyone, including those who have an agenda against you. Your privacy, therefore, is more at risk than ever.

Spy Cameras today come in very small sizes and all sorts of forms.

 

 

Out of this Craziness, we create hope, hope in the name of VESANY.

 

WIRELESS DETECTION

VESANY detects a wide range of wireless signals, 100MHz to 6GHz, within 3m/10ft., leaving spy cams, wireless trackers, GPS locators etc. nowhere to hide.

INFRARED SCANNING

After making sure there is wireless signal emitting, use the infrared scanning feature to quickly locate the source of the signal. Camera lens will reflect the infrared light, which is how VESANY pinpoints the spy cameras.

 

ANTI BREAK-IN ALERT

VESANY boasts a sensitive motion sensor, which detects even every slight movements. Hang it off the door knob of your hotel room, so you can enjoy a night of sound sleep. If somebody tries to break in, VESANY picks up the movements and sets off a high-pitched alarm and a red glare immediately, effectively fending off the perpetrators.

 

ANTI THEFT ALERT

 When traveling, you have to have some luggage, be it a handy little brief case or a few big trunks. They may or may not be very valuable, but losing one of these could put you in big troubles for the rest of the journey. Hang it off your luggage while you're occupied and couldn't keep an eye on it. Anyone tries to move it will trigger the alarm.

 

COMPACT & LASTING

When designing VESANY, we had traveling in mind. We knew it had to be compact and portable with a long battery life, and last but not the least, stylish. Now with VESANY, you can travel with safety, security and in style.

 

DO NOT FALL VICTIM OF HIDDEN CAMERAS

 

PRODUCT DIAGRAM

 

OPERATION PATHS

Vesany is multipurpose and features 5 different modes, which are,

Mode 1: WIFI Detection

Mode 2: Full-Band Detection

Mode 3: Infrared Scanning

Mode 4: Naked-Eye Search

Mode 5: Motion Detection

SPECIFICATIONS

 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX

 

PERKS

 

BEHIND THE SCENE

 

TIME LINE

 

MEDIA FEATURES

story:
A STORM IS BREWING

Our small team has over 150 years of combined paddlesports experience and have been witness to many new technologies. The invention of the pedal drive has changed the game for paddlesports and vastly expanded its accessibility. Now there's no need to perfect your paddling form to efficiently glide across the water. 

We wanted to design the ultimate pedal drive kayak, but at a reasonable price. 

We've accomplished just that, and the result is stunning. Now we need your help to bring this project to life.

MEET THE STRIKE

The Strike encompasses the ultimate combination of performance, durability and rigability. We designed the Strike to be the perfect vessel for exploring the coast, bird watching, a day of fishing, a quick morning workout or anything else you can dream of doing on the water.

PERFORMANCE

The beauty of pedal drive kayaks is their ease of use. There's no "form" to master, therefore no prior experience is necessary to fully enjoy your time on the water. Anyone can hop in the Strike and begin your next adventure. 

The Freedom Drive simply drops into a pair of secure drive locks, and with a push of the feet, the fins move side-to-side and propel you forward. This side-to-side movement mimics how a penguin's wings allow it to glide through the water.

Steering is as easy as a flick of the wrist. The rudder drops down by simply releasing a pull cord in the cockpit, and moving the steering lever left or right turns the boat in that direction.

We combined over 150 years of kayaking experience to design the ultimate sit-on-top kayak hull. The result is a kayak that handles beautifully whether it's being pedaled with your legs or paddled with your arms.

DESIGN

We designed the Strike from the ground up by combining our favorite design features in the kayak industry and improving on the common shortcomings.

The Strike features a large rear tankwell and two hatches, giving you plenty of storage for a picnic on the beach or an overnight camping trip with the family. 

The integrated tracks allow you to mount any accessory you need to enhance your experience on the water, from rod holders to camera booms to a place to park your phone or tablet. 

We designed a recess in the hull to allow the Freedom Drive's fins to tuck up and out of the way, allowing for almost zero draft in shallow water, such as when you're launching or landing.

On impact, the rudder pops up into a protective recess in the hull, preventing damage should you run into obstacles or shallow water.

We designed a transducer mounting pocket on the bottom of the hull, so the Strike is ready to be rigged with your favorite fish finder.

DURABILITY

We’ve kept costs down by keeping our team small and our overhead low so that we could deliver a premium kayak at a reasonable price. We knew we needed premium materials to build the ultimate kayak, so we partnered with an industry-leading plastic manufacturer to ensure we used the best.

The Strike is rotomolded using the most advanced plastic in the industry. This specific polymer utilized a proprietary formula that was the result of years and years of R&D, and it boasts superior impact resistance while maintaining stiffness. Add in the best UV protective additives on the market, and you’ve got a hull that will withstand abuse and weather for many years to come.

FUTURE SUPPORT

This project was spurred to life by Accent and Cannon Paddles, and we aren't new to paddlesports. With 35 years in the industry and over 2 million paddles sold worldwide, we are already set up to provide full product support and rock star customer service down the road.

WHERE YOU COME IN

We believe in this project so much that we took on huge financial risks to get this kayak to the  production stage on our own. We chose a Flexible Funding campaign because we're all in, and we will bring this product to life no matter what.

But we need your help to order the bulk materials necessary to begin full-scale production of the Strike.

Your contribution will be used for purchasing raw materials such as plastic and hardware parts, as well as labor costs such as “cooking” the boats and outfitting them with all the features we packed into this kayak. 

We could have gone a different direction to acquire the funding we needed, but we wanted to engage paddlers and adventure-seekers alike and offer the Strike at a steep discount for those interesting in being a part of the movement from day one.

PERKS

RISKS & CHALLENGES

We took many risks in deciding to undertake this project, but many of those have been addressed or never came to fruition at this stage. The prototypes have been put through the paces, and at this point only fine tuning and minor tweaks need to be made.

One challenge we face is shipping cost, but thanks to Stu’s relationships and contacts through his paddle company, we are working through those challenges to get our shipping costs as low as possible.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you aren’t in the market for a kayak at this time, you can still help us get the word out! Share this campaign with your friends, co-workers, family members or on your social media channels to help us bring the magic of walking on water to the masses.

story:
Pre-Order Here: https://preorder.yathletics.com

 

Re-Engineering A Flagship  

This product is an evolution of the founding design of the SilverAir T-Shirt, the first product we launched almost 5 years ago. At the time, our goal was to develop the best athletic t-shirt in the world and we think we delivered just that. Then, we saw you using the t-shirt as daily wear and for traveling light, so the products that followed were geared towards everyday performance. With this new generation, we bring to you a t-shirt engineered with our most advanced and versatile fabric yet, and one that is simply a joy to wear day and night.

Product Details

Every bit of this product is custom made. To start, we created a double sided fabric with merino wool on the inside for its ability to regulate temperature, manage moisture, and resist odor. We use premium grade 17.5 micron fibers which are ultra fine and feel incredibly soft against the skin.

 

While merino wool is bacteriostatic and offers a first layer of protection against odor, we add pure silver (in the form of metallic yarns) which we find to be the most effective solution for neutralizing odor causing bacteria. The production of our SilverAir yarn begins at the molecular level where the metallic formulation is precisely controlled and is free of nickel and other heavy metals. Unlike chemical and nano treatments, our silver is permanently knit into the fabric and will never wash away. When you turn the product inside-out, you can actually see the silver throughout.

 

To complete the fabric, we plait the exterior with nylon for a durable finish and a beautiful hand feel. The strength of the nylon perfectly complements the lightweight merino. We use an open knit structure that is airy and breathable to create an extremely light but sturdy t-shirt that weighs less than 120 grams (in a medium size).

 

You'll love wearing it by itself in warm weather, and it makes a fantastic base layer during the winter. Best of all, it is highly packable and lets you travel light without the burden of heavy luggage. You can comfortably fit two t-shirts, two pairs of socks, and two underwear in a small packing cube that will fit any bag.

 

We wanted to appeal to a wide range of style, in a variety of conditions. As with all our products, the main focus is always on the material and construction. The body of the t-shirt is seamless, so it is void of any stitching. It has a pure uninterrupted form with mesh knit in the underarms and two clean jacquard lines down the back. The sleeves are stitched to the body using flat-lock seams to prevent chafing, and follows a raglan construction to enable better mobility of the arms while sitting cleanly over the shoulders.

 

With each new iteration, we continuously strive to simplify and improve a product based on your demands. We believe the SilverAir Merino T-Shirt is the epitome of everything we have learned so far. We can't wait for you to try it!  

Image Gallery

Styles & Colors

 

T-SHIRT - Available in short sleeve crew neck, short sleeve v-neck, and long sleeve crew neck.

*Carbon Black color has visible silver lines on the exterior (see 00:27 in video).

 

Measurement Guide 

The products we are offering in this campaign are going to be available in following sizes:

*XXL size T-Shirt will be available in short sleeve and long sleeve crew neck and covers chest size 48"

About Us 

We want to simplify your life with thoughtfully designed gear. We believe that the clothing you wear everyday should not only be comfortable and good looking, but also functional in every aspect.

We design each product from scratch with materials and components tailored specifically towards it, and with an eye on details. Although we started with functional sportswear, our products have evolved to be core basics that you'll want to wear daily and travel the world in.

Important Details About The Campaign

We try to offer great deals on our crowdfunding campaigns and you're also the first to receive new products. The money you pledge towards our campaign goes directly into the development and production of our products. We hope you understand that this campaign is not a store front. If you want more flexibility in trying our products, we recommend purchasing them from yathletics.com at retail value.

REFUNDS 

We generally do not issue refunds for Indiegogo pledges. If for some reason you want to back out of your pledge after the campaign ends, you may request a refund but we reserve the right to issue or deny it. If we do issue a refund, we will deduct 10% from the total pledge to cover the fees associated with your pledge.

EXCHANGES 

If the product(s) you receive do not fit, you may exchange them for a different size, except for socks and underwear. T-Shirts must be new and need to be in their original packaging with hang tags attached. Socks and underwear come in individually sealed packets and cannot be exchanged once opened. We recommend trying one pair before opening the remaining ones so you can exchange sealed socks and underwear for a different size.

To learn more about how to exchange products, please visit https://www.yathletics.com/pages/ksreturns

INTERNATIONAL BACKERS

All international shipments are subject to duties, taxes and clearing fees which you are responsible for paying. Most countries will assess duties/taxes on your package and in certain countries the carrier will pre-pay the duties and taxes and bill you later. If you refuse delivery, your package will be abandoned. Once abandoned, we can’t ship another package to you or issue a refund.

If for some reason you want to back out of your pledge after the campaign ends, you may request a refund but we reserve the right to issue or deny it. If we do issue a refund, we will deduct 10% from the total pledge to cover the fees associated with your pledge.EXCHANGES If the product(s) you receive do not fit, you may exchange them for a different size, except for socks and underwear. T-Shirts must be new and need to be in their original packaging with hang tags attached. Socks and underwear come in individually sealed packets and cannot be exchanged once opened. We recommend trying one pair before opening the remaining ones so you can exchange sealed socks and underwear for a different size.To learn more about how to exchange products, please visit https://www.yathletics.com/pages/ksreturnsINTERNATIONAL BACKERSAll international shipments are subject to duties, taxes and clearing fees which you are responsible for paying. Most countries will assess duties/taxes on your package and in certain countries the carrier will pre-pay the duties and taxes and bill you later. If you refuse delivery, your package will be abandoned. Once abandoned, we can’t ship another package to you or issue a refund.

story:
Short Summary

Since 2006, we have been offering a way to experience history and sites of Washington DC in a unique and personal way. DC by Foot is a team of over a dozen guides - many with advanced degrees in history, education and museum studies. Many of our guides have been with us for almost a decade.

In that time, we have become the go to tour company for school groups, families, corporate groups, locals and more. With COVID-19, we are not touring (though we are putting out a lot of virtual content) but we are still researching and developing new tours and experiences for everyone to enjoy as soon as its safe.

This campaign allows us to continue operations and support our team as we turn ideas into new tours, curate new experiences and continue our online virtual tours.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Buy a ticket to our famous Ghosts of Georgetown Tour ($49/person; $59 for 2)
  • Book a private experience of any of our tours (2 hours) with our expert guides ($195)
  • Simply donate any amount to help support our awesome team

The Impact

We're more than just guides who work together, we are a family. Our staff maintains the operations of the company - website content, social media, the paperwork that no one else wants to do, and the guides rely on us to come back in full force to sponsor their tours. Support at this time makes sure that when the crisis has passed and it's safe to travel, we can them back to touring. 

Risks & Challenges

Everyone is in a place of unknown right now with fears of how long this is going to last and what the world will be like once it's over. We are fortunate that there is little doubt that tours will resume one day. We are actively working to accommodate whatever tourism looks like in the future, starting with offering small group private tours and tours for locals.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please help spread the world and use the Indiegogo share tools to let others know about the campaign.
  • Remember us when you plan your next trip - whenever that may be.
  • Follow us on Social Media (www.facebook.com/freetoursbyfootdc)

story:
Frankie & Jota

 

 

Frankie is a Northwest native and active pursuer of global travel.  Since living in Ecuador as an exchange student at age 17, he can’t finish one trip before planning the next.  “I like to think I’m retracing the steps of early explorers and great thinkers” -- from Charles Darwin on the Galapagos Islands to Edmund Hillary at Mount Everest base camp.  As a past medical technician with long hours and extended time off, Frankie traveled the world networking with amazing people of all cultures and hopes Bunk+Brew will help fellow travelers do the same.

 

 

Jota (or "J" in English) is an adopted Oregon native and licensed Oregon attorney.  Prior to Bunk+Brew, Jota spent four years consulting in-house for an IT company taking cloud-based, analytics software to market and negotiating hundreds of deals totaling over $5 million in sales.  Then in Fall 2015, he bought a 4x4 in Los Angeles, drove from Mexico to Panama, and retreated in Cuba.  His experience in over 50 hostels across 8 countries led to the inspiration behind Bunk+Brew and his return to the US.

 

 

The Campaign

The Historic Lucas House is the first and oldest brick building in Bend, Oregon, and its preservation as the *only* affordable downtown lodging depends on you!

To continue a legacy of over 100 years (1910) and to ensure a sustainable retreat for every adventure traveler passing through Bend, our primary objectives are to modernize the electrical system, replace energy-sucking appliances, and satisfy all health and safety compliance requirements.  If our campaign is successful, we will also develop our indoor and outdoor spaces to bring locals and travelers together to share stories over food and drink.

 

 

The Uniqueness of our Campaign

Our perks range from $5 to $5,000 and cover lodging, bike, ski and paddle board rentals, brew, swag, and other wacky stuff like a brunch with Frankie and Jota where you can pick their brains about outrageous travel stories.

Our goal is to raise $15,000, but our hope is to exceed.  If we fall short, we will not be deterred -- every dollar raised will still be applied to the Historic Lucas House and we will continue advocating for our cause until our vision is fulfilled.

  *All requested dates are first come first serve basis*

 

 

Campaign Hurdles

The older the home, the more the compliance required (and this is an old home).  However, with Frankie’s hands-on experience in home-ownership and Jota’s expertise in navigating rules and regulations, there's no doubt this house will be restored.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

To all the world nomads, van lifers, and hostellers out there, this is your chance to support your way of life in Bend, Oregon.

If you can’t contribute financially, follow us on Instagram and Facebook.  Then make some noise with the Indiegogo share tools!  Thanks for your support!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

For general questions or investment opportunities, please contact:

partners@bunkandbrew.com 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Special thanks to Northwest Portland Hostel, Bridge City Media, Flash Ink, VisitBend and Bend Mattress Factory.

story:
• This knife is the sharpest, strongest, most durable knife on the planet – period!
  • It lasts 10 times longer than other knives in this category.
  • The LIQUIDIAMOND® edge is made with a patented metal alloy matrix developed by NASA and Cal-Tech – and now with Diamond-Like Carbon (DLC) added – then combined with tungsten to produce a cutting edge second to none.
  • This special metal alloy is twice as strong as titanium.
  • We have licensed this patented alloy for use with the Ultimatedge Knife. No one else has these rights for this knife category.
  • This is a better knife and better value than knives costing hundreds more. Be among the first to have one.
  • Multiple bushcraft and survival knife experts have tested our prototype and have given it rave reviews.

If you're going to spend serious time outdoors, then the indispensable tool you must have is a top-flight bushcraft and survival knife.  

At Ultimatedge Knives, we sadly learned that very little has changed in knife-making in over 100 years. Knife manufacturers have been trying to address the same problems for centuries. The steel may be too soft – the knife edge dulls too quickly – and they need lots of maintenance. But until now, nothing has really changed.

So we began our search for a way to move knife-making forward into the 21st century. Our search led us to a patented metal alloy matrix that was developed by Cal-Tech and tested by NASA. We acquired the rights to use this material in the world of bushcraft and survival knives – and our Ultimatedge Knife is the result.

We strongly believe this will reinvent the outdoor knife industry and become the NEW standard for excellence in this field.

Sharpness is THE most critical attribute for any outdoor knife. And the knife edge angle is one of the most critical factors that determines sharpness. The harder the material, the sharper the blade edge.

But in ordinary steel knives, a higher level of hardness also makes the knife edge harder to maintain – and the edge chips easily.

The Ultimatedge Knife edge is made from a patented metal alloy matrix – which we call LIQUIDIAMOND® – that was developed by Cal-Tech and NASA. Now we have made it even better by adding DLC (Diamond-Like Carbon) – and then combined this matrix with tungsten. It's harder than any steel, yet isn't brittle and resists rust.

The hardness of a metal alloy is measured in various ways. VERY expensive knives, costing hundreds of dollars, are made from higher carbon steel that is brittle and can chip easily. The Ultimatedge Knife blows away the competition by scoring well above others on the Vickers Scale without the brittle downside.

As we have said, the harder the material is, the sharper the blade that can be made from it. Here is a cutting test analysis illustrating the hardness and durability of the Ultimatedge Knife with its Amorphous Diamond Edge.

Most importantly, what this means for YOU is the Ultimatedge Knife surpasses any production knife on the market in this category. It holds its edge better and longer due to the hardness of the metal alloy matrix mixed with tungsten. The combination of hardness, high elasticity, and corrosion resistance make the metal alloy matrix edge highly wear-resistant.

Most knives in this category aim for a combined cutting angle of between 38 and 45 degrees. The Ultimatedge Knife has an aggressive 35-degree combined cutting angle. What does this mean? The sharper the angle, the easier and more precise the cut. And isn't that what you want when safety and certainty are at stake when you are outdoors?

The Ultimatedge Knife Is Ultra Sharp and Lasts 10x Longer Than Ordinary Knives.

This is the “super secret sauce” that sets our bushcraft and survival knife apart from the competition – and makes it the Gold Standard for outdoor safety and survival for bushcrafters, hunters, campers, hikers and survivalists.

The patented metal alloy matrix edge possesses a natural nano-serration at the molecular level. This serration is like microscopic, ultra-hard “teeth” that make the effortless and breath-taking cutting power of the Ultimatedge Knife possible.

Unlike other knives that often are doing little more than “crushing” the object at hand, our knife is actually cutting the object, with an effective slicing motion.

Another benefit of this nano-serration is the self-sharpening aspect of the microscopic teeth. As the knife is used, these tiny teeth are exposed and essentially sharpen themselves – and this is part of what allows the Ultimatedge Knife to retain its ultimate edge far longer than other knives.

On July 5, 2018, a Provisional Patent was filed regarding our Self-Sharpening, Serrated Edge.

It wasn’t enough for us to just acquire the use of the NASA-tested metal alloy matrix. We also needed access to a process for bonding the metal alloy matrix and tungsten cutting edge to the high-quality steel knife blank (2cr14N) that would comprise the rest of the Ultimatedge Knife. Fortunately, we were able to do so.

This required the time and arduous effort to perfect what you see shown in the following video clip. This unique bonding process produces a cutting edge like no other.

The patent-pending edge bonding process is part of what sets the Ultimatedge Knife apart and makes it possible for it to become the new Gold Standard of excellence in the bushcraft and survival knife field.

We believe the combination of the metal alloy matrix and this bonding process will revolutionize the knife-making industry. YOU can be one of the first consumers to experience this Ultimatedge Knife.

While our bushcraft and survival knife reinvents the category with its revolutionary cutting edge, there are still proven knife features that matter – and we have made certain they are part of the Ultimatedge Knife. Here are some of those important features:

  • The tip is sharp and detailed for piercing, drilling and carving.
  • This is a full-tang, fixed-blade knife.
  • It has a conveniently placed lanyard hole.
  • There is a thumb ramp.
  • It has a finger choil for control.
  • The handle is made from G-10 and is ergonomically designed for a superior grip.

And for those who want the “drill-down details” about the Ultimatedge Knife, here they are:

Dimensions:

  • Total length: 235.5 mm
  • Blade length: 99.0 mm
  • Blade width: 37.5 mm
  • Blade thickness: 4.0 mm

Edge Material:

  • 70% tungsten and 30% LIQUIDIAMOND® matrix (including DLC – Diamond-Like Carbon), manufactured in the USA.
  • Self-serrating edge due to the differential in hardness of the matrix and abrasives.
  • 70 HRC abrasive and 50 HRC matrix for ultimate durability and ductility.

Blade Material:

  • 2Cr14N heat treated to 49-50 HRC for optimal toughness, elasticity, and corrosion resistance.
  • Saltwater rated: 304 stainless pins and components work in harmony with LIQUIDIAMOND® edge and 2Cr14N blade.

Other knife makers talk endlessly about the minor differences between their knife and others. They show pictures and diagrams and go on and on. Yes, these features matter – and our team has paid close attention to them too, as you have seen.

But these others don't have anything more important and different to talk about. We do!

The sharpness and durability of our knife edge will become the Gold Standard for knives of this kind. Not many knives can do this:

Below are two charts showing four characteristics that are important when it comes to evaluating knife materials – edge durability, corrosion resistance, toughness and sharpness. See for yourself how the LIQUIDIAMOND® material compares to materials used in most other bushcraft and survival knives.

We have held extensive discussions with the experts who reviewed our final knife prototype. Based on their input – AND on upgrade decisions we have made – here are some of the knife improvements you will experience when you pledge for your own Ultimatedge Knife:

  • Amorphous Diamond-Like Carbon (DLC) has been added to the LIQUIDIAMOND® matrix alloy that comprises the knife edge. Multiple layers of micron scale coatings achieve both extreme durability and toughness.  
  • We are also coating the entire knife blade – edge, blade and tang – with DLC.
  • The Self-Sharpening, Serrated-Edge Geometry has been upgraded with our Provisional Patent filing. Layers of hard surface and soft substrate induce the self-sharpening effect, which increases the effective edge wear area from a few microns to 100+ microns.
  • We will reduce the handle weight and improve balance by adding cutouts to the tang.
  • We will increase the thickness and coke bottle-like curvature of the G-10 handle scales to improve fit and effectiveness.
  • Custom stainless steel pins – which are larger – will be "curved" to match the rounded scales.
  • The metal tang of the knife in the corner with the lanyard hole was relatively sharp and could cause a hand to blister with use. The solution is to move the lanyard hole in and away from the edges slightly and radius that back corner so it is fully rounded.

We firmly believe these changes will even further improve your enjoyment of this game-changing knife.

Let's talk more about cost. We know price is driven by value. Yes, there are knives that cost more – and some that cost less. In fact, there are handmade knives in this class that cost hundreds more.

But if their cutting edge is not harder (and NONE have a harder edge than ours), then they can't match the performance of our knife. This means the value of the Ultimatedge Knife simply can't be beat!

Who would know better about the performance of a bushcraft and survival knife than people who make their living using one – AND whose lives can well depend upon one?

We have placed our prototype knives with a significant number of these people – many of whom are widely known and respected in this field. And their praise has been pouring in.

You've already seen and heard what some of them have had to say. So now see and hear for yourself what more of these experts have to say – in their own words – about the Ultimatedge Knife. 

We can talk all day long about the great performance of the Ultimatedge Knife. But our opinion will never mean as much as the those of these outstanding, experienced outdoors men and women. They have all rigorously tested our knife – and shared their honest and candid opinions.

We want you to feel 100 percent comfortable backing our campaign. So we are offering a full 1-Year Satisfaction Guarantee.  

You must use your knife in the manner it was intended, and not knowingly and intentionally abuse your knife. Then if within one year, it fails due to materials or workmanship, we will replace it. Simply send us your knife and let us know the problem you experienced, and we will send you a new one.

In addition to their Ultimatedge Knife, each backer receives a custom-formed Kydex Sheath for their knife – and it all comes in a handsome box with our logo.

You know best whether one Ultimatedge Knife will satisfy you – or whether you want to pledge to receive multiple knives and perhaps give one or more to family and friends.

Our backer rewards – and your access to pledging to one of them – can be found to the right. But to help you make a decision and simplify the process, here is a summary:

Starting a business and creating a new product is no easy task, and it requires capital. We've made serious progress in creating our Ultimatedge Knife and launching it on the first phase of its business life. Now it's time to raise money and take the next steps.

The money we raise here will be used for our first production run, automating and customizing production, improving our tooling, paying for materials, and hiring additional skilled labor. With your support, you can help make this possible.  

Our team has worked hard to bring us to where we are right now. Our prototypes have been thoroughly vetted and proven in the hands of our “knife gurus” in the field, where it counts. And you have NO risk, thanks to our Satisfaction Guarantee.

If you are an outdoor enthusiast – whether bushcraft, camping, hunting, hiking or survival activities – and you have read this far, it is highly likely you have some kind of outdoor knife in your possession. Maybe it is depressingly ordinary, or maybe you thought you were getting something special, but it didn't turn out that way. Or maybe you spent hundreds of dollars on what you have.

No matter what knife you have, your knife is only some variation on what has been available for over 100 years!

Now you have the chance to be among the very first to have the Ultimatedge Knife. This incredible knife will be the game-changer that redefines the category because it reinvents the category.

Our use of the patented Cal-Tech developed and NASA tested metal alloy matrix (LIQUIDIAMOND®), now with Diamond-Like Carbon (DLC) added, plus using the patent-pending process of bonding this alloy matrix to a high-quality steel blank, is what makes all of this possible.

You can have a bushcraft and survival knife that is ultra sharp (and proven so by testing and analysis) – and lasts 10 times longer than ordinary knives. This is what is truly different about our knife – and is what makes it different and better than anything else you have ever owned or used.

After all, getting something newer and better is what crowdfunding is all about, right?

Compare the proven metal hardness and sharpness of our Ultimatedge Knife to the competition. You will see why we call it the new Gold Standard of bushcraft and survival knives.

You can get twice the knife for the same price – or you can get a better knife for half the price. Either way, you win!

Look at our rewards and pick the one that is right for you. Help support us here on Indiegogo – and be the first among your fellow outdoor enthusiasts to have this game-changing Ultimatedge Knife.

Make your pledge now – and get the best bushcraft and survival knife you will ever own!

We will increase the thickness and coke bottle-like curvature of the G-10 handle scales to improve fit and effectiveness.
Custom stainless steel pins – which are larger – will be "curved" to match the rounded scales.
The metal tang of the knife in the corner with the lanyard hole was relatively sharp and could cause a hand to blister with use. The solution is to move the lanyard hole in and away from the edges slightly and radius that back corner so it is fully rounded.
We firmly believe these changes will even further improve your enjoyment of this game-changing knife.Let's talk more about cost. We know price is driven by value. Yes, there are knives that cost more – and some that cost less. In fact, there are handmade knives in this class that cost hundreds more.But if their cutting edge is not harder (and NONE have a harder edge than ours), then they can't match the performance of our knife. This means the value of the Ultimatedge Knife simply can't be beat!Who would know better about the performance of a bushcraft and survival knife than people who make their living using one – AND whose lives can well depend upon one?We have placed our prototype knives with a significant number of these people – many of whom are widely known and respected in this field. And their praise has been pouring in.You've already seen and heard what some of them have had to say. So now see and hear for yourself what more of these experts have to say – in their own words – about the Ultimatedge Knife. We can talk all day long about the great performance of the Ultimatedge Knife. But our opinion will never mean as much as the those of these outstanding, experienced outdoors men and women. They have all rigorously tested our knife – and shared their honest and candid opinions.We want you to feel 100 percent comfortable backing our campaign. So we are offering a full 1-Year Satisfaction Guarantee.  You must use your knife in the manner it was intended, and not knowingly and intentionally abuse your knife. Then if within one year, it fails due to materials or workmanship, we will replace it. Simply send us your knife and let us know the problem you experienced, and we will send you a new one.In addition to their Ultimatedge Knife, each backer receives a custom-formed Kydex Sheath for their knife – and it all comes in a handsome box with our logo.Every Ultimatedge Knife comes with a custom-formed Kydex SheathYou know best whether one Ultimatedge Knife will satisfy you – or whether you want to pledge to receive multiple knives and perhaps give one or more to family and friends.Our backer rewards – and your access to pledging to one of them – can be found to the right. But to help you make a decision and simplify the process, here is a summary:Starting a business and creating a new product is no easy task, and it requires capital. We've made serious progress in creating our Ultimatedge Knife and launching it on the first phase of its business life. Now it's time to raise money and take the next steps.The money we raise here will be used for our first production run, automating and customizing production, improving our tooling, paying for materials, and hiring additional skilled labor. With your support, you can help make this possible.  Our team has worked hard to bring us to where we are right now. Our prototypes have been thoroughly vetted and proven in the hands of our “knife gurus” in the field, where it counts. And you have NO risk, thanks to our Satisfaction Guarantee.The Ultimatedge Knife - the only bushcraft and survival knife you'll ever need!If you are an outdoor enthusiast – whether bushcraft, camping, hunting, hiking or survival activities – and you have read this far, it is highly likely you have some kind of outdoor knife in your possession. Maybe it is depressingly ordinary, or maybe you thought you were getting something special, but it didn't turn out that way. Or maybe you spent hundreds of dollars on what you have.No matter what knife you have, your knife is only some variation on what has been available for over 100 years!THE most important tool for just about any outdoors activity: a sharp, reliable knife!Now you have the chance to be among the very first to have the Ultimatedge Knife. This incredible knife will be the game-changer that redefines the category because it reinvents the category.Our use of the patented Cal-Tech developed and NASA tested metal alloy matrix (LIQUIDIAMOND®), now with Diamond-Like Carbon (DLC) added, plus using the patent-pending process of bonding this alloy matrix to a high-quality steel blank, is what makes all of this possible.You can have a bushcraft and survival knife that is ultra sharp (and proven so by testing and analysis) – and lasts 10 times longer than ordinary knives. This is what is truly different about our knife – and is what makes it different and better than anything else you have ever owned or used.After all, getting something newer and better is what crowdfunding is all about, right?Ultimatedge: the sharpest, most durable bushcraft and survival knife available anywhere!Compare the proven metal hardness and sharpness of our Ultimatedge Knife to the competition. You will see why we call it the new Gold Standard of bushcraft and survival knives.You can get twice the knife for the same price – or you can get a better knife for half the price. Either way, you win!Look at our rewards and pick the one that is right for you. Help support us here on Indiegogo – and be the first among your fellow outdoor enthusiasts to have this game-changing Ultimatedge Knife.Make your pledge now – and get the best bushcraft and survival knife you will ever own!The Ultimatedge Knife - the best knife you'll ever own!

story:
Hello everyone!

 

My name is Elizabeth Ashley and I am a freelance photographer with a bad case of wanderlust. I intend to travel to every continent and atleast 50 countries before I leave this amazing Earth one day. I want to document my experiences, my interviews with locals, trying the local cuisine, and the over all flow of trips. I wish to share my travels with others so they too can gain the power of wanderlust that will not only enrich their minds, but their lives. I truly appreciate the selflesness of those that back me up on my passions and goals. I will be forever greatful.

Be Well,

Elizabeth

story:
Short Summary

On May 4th a fire destroyed Marianne Kloecker's farm in Hazelton, BC: her house, shop, barns, car and many of her animals no longer exist. Due to a legal caveat, she had not been able to renew her fire insurance, because some of the outer walls did not have siding. Please help us raise money to build a new home for her.

Please note that this campaign is in USD! If you are a Canadian citizen, be aware that the amount detracted from your bank account will translate accordingly.

Our Goal:

  • We are looking to raise $60,000 in order to build a modest new home for Marianne.
  • Money will be used for material costs and equipment. See below for more information on cost breakdown for Low Cost High Efficiency style home schematics.
  • Labour will be donated by friends, family, and generous members of the community. 

Who is Marianne Kloeckner?

Many of you may already know Marianne; she is one of the people who you have turned to when you needed advice, a safe place to stay, a ride to Terrace or just a wave and a smile.

For those of you who don't know her: Marianne teaches adult basic education in Kitwanga, BC, and volunteers much of her free time helping out in the community. In a region of prolific drug abuse, poverty and homelessness, her efforts and the house whose doors she kept open for any in need have lent security and empowerment to many, young and old alike, over the years. 

She organizes music workshops and charity walks; volunteers annually at the local rodeo; helps her students find work; fiercely fundraises to provide road trips and outings to those who do not have vehicles; introduces young artists to established mentors; and all in all embodies the spirit of selflessness. 

Marianne (left) and two students, Kispiox Valley Rodeo staff (2011)


Students of the A.B.E at the Walk for Life event (2007)

The House to be Built:


One example of an LCHE house provided by a Net-Zero representative."

A closer look at the cost of housing was kindly provided for us by a Net-Zero Home Building representative. His letter reads:

"The retail turn-key cost of both LCHE houses [I provided] fully constructed and ready to occupy is  $84,600 or $135 per s.f for the peaked roof model versus $117 for the shed roof model.  

"This is a turn-key price which includes the supply and install of all building envelope materials, including post/beam foundation,  6" SIP walls (R24), 12" SIP roof (R50), exterior doors and windows (all triple glazed), Hardy board siding or equivalent, 40 year fiberglass shingles, and all exterior trim. 

"On the interior it includes all interior framing, electrical, plumbing, kitchen and bathroom cabinets, drywall and paint, flooring, interior trim and 5 major appliances. Basically ready to move into.

"These prices are based on durable but relatively inexpensive finishing and all items can be upgraded subject to adjustments in the pricing.

"If you want to do most of the interior finishing labour and pull homeowener's electrical permits, I can sell you a complete building envelope for ~ $50,000 for either model.

"If you want me to provide the supply and install of the complete building exterior and supply the complete the materials package for the interior, but where you provide the labour, I can do that for $16,000.

"So if you had Net-Zero build the home the cost would be $76,600. Alternatively if you had Net-Zero build the complete building envelope and supply you all materials to finish the interior, it would be $66,000.00

This quote does not include home warranty insurance or applicable taxes."


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, you can still help by spreading the word and raising awareness.

story:
At 10am on the 15th August, 2015 a group of Lycra-clad cyclists will begin a 56 mile cycle ride from London to Brighton to raise funds for human rights charity No Going Back.

No Going Back is a unique non-profit organisation and is the only of its kind, providing FREE specialised legal advice and representation to LGBT community members seeking asylum in the UK due to their sexual orientation or gender identity.

The cyclists decided to undertake the challenge as No Going Back is a small charity that has not had much media coverage and asylum seems to be something that is of increasing concern in today’s political and economic climate.

Words cannot describe how such fundraising events help this organisation and its clients. The organisation receives no core funding for paid staff and facilities, and relies on fundraising events and donations to provide its specialised service. The work of the organisation would not be possible without fundraisers and volunteers who share the belief in love without borders.

Any little helps! Truly. And any amount given here would incontrovertably save the lives of so many and enable just one more person to live freely and powerfully as who they are.

So get the word out! Feel free to contribute what you can, especially if you feel just as passionately about this cause.

And if you'd like to be a part of the ride the journey will begin at 10am at the Peace Pagoda in Battersea Park and finish on the Brighton beachfront just to the west by the Palace Pier and will take 5 – 6 hours.

Contact organiser Martin Ireland at martinireland65@yahoo.co.uk.

To explore the work and commitment of No Going Back to LGBT asylum rights in the UK (or even look into working with us!) simply check us out at: http://nogoingback.org.uk.

A video highlighting our work can also be seen using the following link: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=4R-bCHUwvt4

For all general inquiries please contact Martin Ireland, or Lee Griffiths at M: 07842 031 545 or lee@nogoingback.org.uk.

story:
Hey Guys!
As many of you may know, I've pledged to climb to Everest Base Camp in March and raise money for impoverished Nepalese women and children, through World Vision. So far, with your help, I have raised over $5000 that will go directly to these people in need.

However, currently I have raised very little money towards the travel expenses involved. While I have been doing my best to save, being a full time uni student on a grocery store wage has made this difficult. I need to come up with $5200 for flights and accommodation by December 8th (I've already paid over $1500 from my own pocket). While I would happily take a loan to go (I'm not going to miss out on this wonderful opportunity) any chance of avoiding that would be a lifesaver.

Any funds raised on top of what is needed will go directly to worldvision.

If you wish to donate there instead the link is 
https://everest2015.everydayhero.com/au/will-ac...

Hopefully with a little more help from some amazing people (you), I can limit the financial stress this endeavour is causing.

Be well,
Will Ackroyd.

story:
BUY AT WWW.GERMFREEBEE.COM

The Germ Free Bee Airplane Seat Cover & Blanket

What is the Germ Free Bee and How does it work?

The Germ Free Bee is a Personal, Customized Airplane Seat Cover that wraps around the seat’s headrest like a fitted bed sheet and drapes over the seat with wings to serve as a blanket. The Germ Free Bee is made of high-quality material and is 100 % washable.  The Germ Free Bee not only shields travelers from the previous passenger but it also serves as a Personalized Blanket/Wrap.


Have you ever wondered HOW MANY have sat there before YOU?!?

Airline tickets go up and baggage fees skyrocket but Airplane Seats get smaller AND Definitely Not Cleaner.  Airlines claim to clean the plane after each flight but study after study shows that airplanes and airplane seats are filthy and covered in germs.  There is a lack of provided blankets on airplanes and there is NO accountability on whether or not they reuse the blankets.  You pay Hundreds of Dollars for your flight so you deserve to be clean and comfortable! 


Why IndieGoGo Crowd Funding?

I am asking for YOUR help to raise enough funds for my first round of production (fabric purchasing, cutting, production, manufacturing, etc..). 

The Trademark is approved, the Patent Application is submitted, the Fabric is chosen, the Factory is located in the United States and the Prototype is made.  I have been working on this concept for the last 2 years and I am very excited to launch!  


Germ Free Bee Supports Our United States Service Members  

When you purhcase the BEEGrateful-Support OUR Troops package and EVERY package following, a United States Service Member will also receive a Germ Free Bee for their return home from service. Also, when the Germ Free Bee goes into full production, a portion of the proceeds will go to a Military Non-Profit Organization that helps with the travel needs of OUR Military and their Families.


Check Out Our Amazing Campaign Perks!!!

Spa Packages from the Spa on Rodeo

Germ Free Bees for our United States Service Members

Every Germ Free Bee comes with a Convenient Travel Bag!

UnBEElievable T-Shirts by DILASCIA


Visit our Website
Thank you for your support!!!

-yale scott

AND you can also take it to the Movies...


 I would like to Thank the following people for their Love & Support with the GFB!
Adam, AJ, Anthony, Ben, Bebe, Billy, Bobby, Bridget, David, Davis, Devin, Gino, James, Jason, Jenny, Joey, Josue, Justin, Max, Michael C, Mike P, Mike & Wendy R, Robert, Sergio, Suki, Talaat & Air Hollywood!

FAQ:
Can I wash my Germ Free Bee?  YES - 100% Washable
Is there a refund policy?  YES - 30 Days
Can I take it to the Movies?  YES!  

Please share the Germ Free Bee with your Friends & Family!

story:
Travellr's story began while traveling, when I reached into my bag and sliced open my finger on the exposed blade of my razor.  As a craftsman and leather worker, I responded by designing a razor case and travel bag so this would never happen again. Travellr is built in the US from full grain Horween leather called Buccaneer.  This specific tannage has a water resistant finish and is the perfect material for the Travellr Kit.  We craft each case by hand and assemble with copper rivets, premium brass hardware, genuine YKK zippers and durable thread. We are so confident in the construction of this bag- we are guaranteeing it for life.    


We've specifically designed this cover as a one size fits all case for men's and women's razors, and are yet to find one that it doesn't fit.  Below are some of the razors we've tested the case with, if you don't see yours on the list don't hesitate to ask.


Our Safety Razor Case is designed to fit any DE and SE safety razor with handles up to 4.25 inches in length and 17mm in diameter.  Perfect for travel and the ideal wet shave accessory. 


This is a one size fits all brush case and securely holds any shave brush in place while protecting the bristles.  Adjust the leash around the handle and use that same leash to wrap the case securely closed.





The Travellr Case has a flat design, allowing it to easily fit into your carry-on, suitcase, or pack. The design allows the case to grow to fit whatever your adventures require, and it's 9.5 x 6 x 2.5 dimensions allow plenty of room to fit all of your travel size toiletries and makeup.  


We are offering two standard colors options - brown and black.  Both options are made from water resistant full grain Horween leather and have a rich color and grain.  If you are backing the Travellr Kit you have the option to get a brown Travellr Case with a black Razor Cover.  Surveys to choose color options will be sent out once the campaign is finished.

story:
Connect Global, Pay Local

The premise is simple. Businessmen and travelers around the world may find it hard to get high-speed, easy-to-use, reliable Internet at a fair price. 

The GlocalMe U2 is a mobile phone-sized device that enables you to have a WiFi hotspot on the go, with the added bonus of paying local rates when traveling internationally. It can be connected to 5 devices without using a SIM and works perfectly at 4G high speed.

 

Why GlocalMe U2

 

Featured on

 

Cloud SIM Technology

In order to eliminate the soaring roaming costs when traveling abroad, uCloudlink has developed Cloud SIM technology which helps access different operators' networks, and gives people more freedom and effectiveness when moving from one country to another.

The Cloud SIM technology, requiring no local SIM card to access the Internet, frees people from worrying about data while on the move, or sticking to dodgy hotel and cafe WiFi between meetings.

 

Ultra Fast 4G on the Move

If you’ve ever traveled internationally, you know how painful it can be to find not-so-expensive data packages. Roaming charges are extensive, signals may disconnect from time to time, hotels still charge for WIFI.

The GlocalMe U2 offers 4G data speeds on the go. When 4G is not available, it will automatically drop to the best and most stable networks. 

You will be able to stay connected, keeping friends, family and business partners updated with pictures, emails and message, seamlessly. 

 

Work as traditional MiFi by Supporting two SIM card slots

The GlocalMe U2 doesn't need a SIM card. Though there are a couple of SIM slots: a regular one and the other being micro SIM in case you prefer shifting to local data. 

 

GlocalMe services cover 100+countries


Manage the Account on Your Palm

Manage the data usage effectively and smartly. 

Choose an amount to top up (priced in euros) or select from the data packages, check out the data report and usage statistics in detail via the GlocalMe U2 APP. 

We know data privacy MATTERS. GlocalMe U2 APP has embedded encrypting technology to keep the system and data secure.  

Also, whenever you update the APP, data consumption will not be charged by GlocalMe.

 

Sharing Makes It more Fun 

Enjoy the fun of shareable connection because

  • Using a public WiFi probably results in being hacked
  • GlocalMe U2 is your very own safe network

Access a secure WiFi network that can connect up to 5 devices.

U2 supports WiFi-enable devices such as smart phone (Android/iOs), laptop, tablet, smart watch/band, camera, etc.

 

Best-Value Data Package Rates

GlocalMe is always trying to challenge complex high-cost roaming fees.  

We offer ​

  • Data Packages: specify your destination country to get the best fit data packages
  • Balance: only pay for the exact amount of data you use

 

Other Features? 

GlocalMe U2 works with multiple carriers comprehensive network from phone standards of FDD, TDD, WCDMA, CDMA, EVDO, GSM.

It will automatically switch to the fastest network in your location. 

 

GlocalMe U2 can intelligently adapt to AC current ratings from 0.5A to 3A, at full speed, without much effort. 

Weighing 151g, it is the ideal and handy gadget to pack for travelling, business trips or holidays.

By reducing the battery capacity from 6000mAh to 3500mAh and eliminating the 3.5 touch-screen of G2, we cut the weight. 

 

4 steps before surfing freely. It is really this simple. 

 

Timeline

 

Rewards


Note: It DOES NOT include the shipping cost as it may vary greatly from one location to another. Our staff will connect you personally to charge after the campaign is closed. 

Generally, destinations in the North America and the Europe won't cost much except remote areas.

 

For the "U2 + UNLIMITED DATA FOR A YEAR" perk priced at $349, the 58 countries covered are: 

Austria, Australia, Belgium, Canada, China, Colombia, Costa Rica, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Egypt, Fiji, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hong Kong, Iceland, India, Indonesia, Ireland, Islands, Israel, Italy, Japan, Kenya, Korea, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malaysia, Mexico, Monaco, Morocco, Netherlands, New Zealand, Philippines, Poland, Romania, Portugal, Puerto Rico, Russia, San Marino, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Africa, Spain, Sri Lanka, Switzerland, Taiwan, Thailand, The Aland Islands, The Vatican, Turkey, United Kingdom, United States, Vietnam.

 

24/7 SERVICE

Email: service@ucloudlink.com
Hotline: +852-8191-2660

 

Winner of 2016 AEF(Asian Electronics Forum) Innovation Awards

Hong Kong uCloudlink Network Technology Co., Ltd was created by the international communications industry veteran, the main management and technical backbone from large international first-class communication enterprises. Through building up the largest roaming mobile virtual network operator (MVNO) uCloudlink has become a global pioneer in Cloud SIM technology and now offers customers a simple and affordable Wi-Fi hotspot that would give people freedom of international travelling, without companies and businesses having to change their communication habits or being restricted by roaming charges.

 

 

FAQ

 

  • What's the difference between U2 and G2?

-- Lighter weight with minimal design.

-- One button easy operation.

-- More convenient, completely APP control after eliminating touch-screen display on the device.

-- Quick access to the internet, more stable with updated device and APP.

-- More SIM frequency bands supported.

-- Lower price with reduced battery capacity from 6000mAh to 3500mAh and no touch-screen on the device.

 

  • How long is the validity of the date package? How to get data package?

After the activation, there will be one-year validity for these three types of data package (1GB, 3GB, 9GB). Note that once the user switches on the U2 unit, the default package will be activated automatically. Other than the default packages, the newly bought packages will only be activated in your destination country.

 

  • What’s the data volume in annual global data package? How to order the data package?

Annual global data package currently covers the following 58 countries. Maximum 2GB data every month with unlimited speed. When the data usage reaches 2GB within a month, your connection speed may slow down to 128kb/s. You can order global data package the same way with other data package.

*58 country coverage

 

  • Hong long is the validity of top-up plan? How to order and use top-up plans?

No time limit for the usage of the top-up plan. You can use the credit to order any of the data packages. We’ll give you a voucher code to get your credit.

 

  •  How will shipping fee be charged and how long will delivery last?

We’ll not charge you shipping and tax fee when it under $10, and when it over $10, you need to make the payment.

Shipping should be within a month after the end of the project. The delivery period may vary, depends on or changes according to the logistics.

In addition, we will assign team members to assist with production and supply chain management to make sure that all our products are thoroughly tested, meet high margins in quality standards, and flow along smoothly while upholding excellent supply chain ethics.

 

  • What’s the price for data package?

We have adjusted our data packages in September and added data package for every single country. Maximum price reduction for single country data package is up to 60%. At present, we offer region data package and country data package with a price for every 1GB range from 5.0 to 29.9 Euro. Please check detailed price inform on GlocalMe website.

 

  • How long will it take to connect to the internet?

Depends on the local Internet conditions. Normally, it takes 1-2 minutes. And it may need several minutes if your device is first time to be used in a country.

 

  • How do I use a local SIM card?

The U2 is Unlocked, Contract-free, and can also be used as a traditional unlocked Wi-Fi hotspot with the insertion of local SIM cards. Just put your local SIM card in the slot, connect to GlocalMe Wi-Fi (GlocalMe_xxxx) -> access: 192.168.43.1-> Login -> Choose your SIM card

 

  • How do I change/switch my data package?

Once you switch on the U2 and connect to the Internet, your data package will be activated automatically and switch to the local package. When your account has several data packages available in the country, the data purchased earlier will be counted first. At present, users can not choose which data package to be used first. If the data package hasn’t been activated and within 7 days after your payment, it can be refunded to your GlocalMe account.

 

  • How do I get to start with my device when first receiving it?

Scan the QR code on GlocalMe website/on the manual or download GlocalMe APP from Apple store or Google Play store.

Sign up.

Input IMEI code or scan QR code on the device to active your device.

 

  • How to manage the device and my data package from GlocalMe APP?

On GlocalMe App, you can manage your GlocalMe account as well as activate or deactivate your GlocalMe device.

 

  • How do I change my Wi-Fi SSID and password?

Connect to GlocalMe Wi-Fi (GlocalMe_xxxx) -> access: 192.168.169.1-> Login (input the password: “admin”) -> WIFI Settings (change Wi-Fi SSID and password) ->Apply (Successful)

 

  • What if I drop my U2 and lost it?

You can login your GlocalMe account, and deactivate your device immediately to protect your balance and data package.

 

  • How many GlocalMe devices could one account bind to/activate?

One GlocalMe account can bind to and activate any GlocalMe devices, but only one at a time. If you need to use more than one device simultaneously, you need more GlocalMe accounts to activate them.

 

  • Why my SIM card doesn’t work?

SIM cards from some carriers are locked with PIN. You need to disable the PIN first to use it on U2.

 

  • How far can my device physically be from GlocalMe U2 for it to work?

If there is a good signal and not blocked by objects, the range/distance for the WiFi is around 10 meters. While, we suggest keeping the device within 5 meters.

 

  • How to reduce the unnecessary data consumption?

It is important to remember that when a smartphone is connected to a data signal there may be certain Apps that auto-update, expending a lot of data traffic. We would, therefore, suggest setting your U2 network on the smartphone as a mobile hotspot to restrict Apps from using data in the background, if you have an Android device or iOS devices, turn off background refreshing in the general settings.

Settings->Wireless & networks->Data usage (unselect “Auto-sync data” and select “Show WLAN usage”) ->Mobile hotpots->select GlocalMe_xxxx
story_txt:
Connect Global, Pay LocalThe premise is simple. Businessmen and travelers around the world may find it hard to get high-speed, easy-to-use, reliable Internet at a fair price. The GlocalMe U2 is a mobile phone-sized device that enables you to have a WiFi hotspot on the go, with the added bonus of paying local rates when traveling internationally. It can be connected to 5 devices without using a SIM and works perfectly at 4G high speed. Why GlocalMe U2 Featured on Cloud SIM TechnologyIn order to eliminate the soaring roaming costs when traveling abroad, uCloudlink has developed Cloud SIM technology which helps access different operators' networks, and gives people more freedom and effectiveness when moving from one country to another.The Cloud SIM technology, requiring no local SIM card to access the Internet, frees people from worrying about data while on the move, or sticking to dodgy hotel and cafe WiFi between meetings. Ultra Fast 4G on the MoveIf you’ve ever traveled internationally, you know how painful it can be to find not-so-expensive data packages. Roaming charges are extensive, signals may disconnect from time to time, hotels still charge for WIFI.The GlocalMe U2 offers 4G data speeds on the go. When 4G is not available, it will automatically drop to the best and most stable networks. You will be able to stay connected, keeping friends, family and business partners updated with pictures, emails and message, seamlessly.  Work as traditional MiFi by Supporting two SIM card slotsThe GlocalMe U2 doesn't need a SIM card. Though there are a couple of SIM slots: a regular one and the other being micro SIM in case you prefer shifting to local data.  GlocalMe services cover 100+countries
Manage the Account on Your PalmManage the data usage effectively and smartly. Choose an amount to top up (priced in euros) or select from the data packages, check out the data report and usage statistics in detail via the GlocalMe U2 APP. We know data privacy MATTERS. GlocalMe U2 APP has embedded encrypting technology to keep the system and data secure.  Also, whenever you update the APP, data consumption will not be charged by GlocalMe. Sharing Makes It more Fun Enjoy the fun of shareable connection because
Using a public WiFi probably results in being hacked
GlocalMe U2 is your very own safe network
Access a secure WiFi network that can connect up to 5 devices.U2 supports WiFi-enable devices such as smart phone (Android/iOs), laptop, tablet, smart watch/band, camera, etc. Best-Value Data Package RatesGlocalMe is always trying to challenge complex high-cost roaming fees.  We offer ​
Data Packages: specify your destination country to get the best fit data packages
Balance: only pay for the exact amount of data you use
 Other Features? GlocalMe U2 works with multiple carriers comprehensive network from phone standards of FDD, TDD, WCDMA, CDMA, EVDO, GSM.It will automatically switch to the fastest network in your location.  GlocalMe U2 can intelligently adapt to AC current ratings from 0.5A to 3A, at full speed, without much effort. Weighing 151g, it is the ideal and handy gadget to pack for travelling, business trips or holidays.By reducing the battery capacity from 6000mAh to 3500mAh and eliminating the 3.5 touch-screen of G2, we cut the weight.  4 steps before surfing freely. It is really this simple.  Timeline RewardsNote: It DOES NOT include the shipping cost as it may vary greatly from one location to another. story:
Carry everything with you in a single backpack that fits in the overhead locker. Our starting point for all Arcido bags is the idea of streamlined, efficient travel. We want to travel hands-free, and we think wheelie bags are limiting. 

We’ve taken the feedback from the thousands of customers who have used our Faroe and Arcido bags to create two new products : Akra and Vaga. Akra is a lightweight travel backpack designed to give you easy access to all the stuff you need when you travel. Vaga is the daypack that accompanies it, which fits neatly inside. Our laptop protection system is second to none - suspend your laptop or macbook in a harness that hugs your device, and can be switched between the two bags. So whether you’re in travel or day mode, your laptop is protected.

The main travel pack, Akra, is carry-on size and fits all the gear you'll need for a two week trip or longer. Our lightweight baby brother day pack, Vaga, is lightweight and can be slipped into the main pack and ready to use when you've arrived in town and want to explore. The adjustable laptop harness can easily transfer between bags.

AKRA gives you easy access to the things you need when you travel. Take out your laptop or macbook at airport security by pulling the tab, keep your passport hidden and secure. We’ve made it easy to get to things you need whilst protecting and hiding your important stuff.

Packing your Akra bag is easy and efficient. The whole bag can be opened flat for easy packing. We designed packing cubes that fit inside the bag perfectly, helping you to organise and compress your clothes. the front pocket can be accessed from both inside and outside the bag. This means that you don't have to display the bag's contents when removing the wash bag at security.

 AKRA features padded and ventilated backplate designed to make carrying a heavy bag on your back comfortable. In addition, we’re shipping the pack with sternum and waist straps to help spread the load. It makes carrying even a fully-laden bag a comfortable experience.

Designed for up to 15.4" laptops, the harness inside AKRA is the latest iteration of an idea we’ve been developing for over a year. Store your device securely, no matter what size it is - in a suspended harness that can be removed if you don’t need it. Because it’s suspended, your laptop’s protected even if you drop your bag.

Use the pull-tab to lift the laptop out of the bag whenever you need it. The harness also fits inside the daypack so your device is protected in day-mode, too!  

Weighing just 600g, our VAGA day pack is small and light, packing down to practically nothing. It easily fits inside the main compartment of Akra, making it ideal for exploring your destination and day-to-day use. The laptop harness clips inside either bag, giving you the same laptop protection whether you’re in travel or day mode.

We use lightweight, highly durable Kodra as the main body material for our bags. As a highly water-resistant material, your stuff won't get wet even in rain showers. Using this material we have manged to designed a bag that weighs just 1.3kg (2.8lbs) including straps (which can be removed, to make the bag weigh just 1.1kg).  

It's really important to get the zips right on a bag, because they're usually the first thing to fail. That's why we've used YKK on both bags, and all accessories including packing cubes. YKK are the best you can buy, and are designed to cope with heavy use.  

Our straps feature high quality magnetic clasps that make it easy to lock-in when you need added support, and disconnect easily.

We are Will & Felix - two guys who are passionate about travel who spend a lot of time on the road. We set up Arcido two years ago with the mission of making the very best carry-on backpacks on the market.   

Our first Kickstarter in 2016  - "The Arcido Bag" - received an incredibly positive reception. People appreciated our style of travel - wearing one backpack to carry everything. They also loved the high quality materials we used, and how organised it made them feel. 

Our follow-up bag was called Faroe. Having sold thousands of Faroe bags, we've gathered a lot of valuable feedback in the process. Talking to our customers means we really understand how they use the product and what they want more of. 

This project is the result of those conversations, and we’ve integrated a lot of the features our customers asked for. As two guys who travel a lot, we've had the opportunity to road-test each iteration of Akra. The result is something usable, lightweight and great-looking.

 

Akra - Large Travel Pack:

• Body Fabric: 500D Blendex Kodra - With PU coating

• Bottom Scuff Fabric: 1000D Codra - With PU coating

• Lining: 150D Premium Polyester Oxford - With PU coating

• Designed to comply with all major airlines size limits

• Zippers: YKK #5 Reverse Coil Zippers

• Dimensions: 21.5" x 13.5" x 8.5"  (55 x 35 x 20cm) 

• Weight: 1.3 kg / 2.4 lbs including waist & sternum straps (1.1kg with straps removed)

• Laptop Harness for up to 15.4" laptops 

• Volume: 35 Litres

 

Vaga - Day Pack:

• Body Fabric: 500D Blendex Kodra - With PU coating

• Lining: 150D Premium Polyester Oxford - With PU coating

• Designed to comply with all major airlines size limits

• Zippers: YKK #5 Reverse Coil Zippers

• Dimensions: 20" x 14" x 6" (50 x 34 x 15cm)

• Weight: 0.6 kg / 1.3 lbs  

• Volume: 20 Litres

 

Warranty : 

•5 Year Warranty in case of fault

Even though our Kickstarter campaign has ended, we are still accepting pre-orders while our manufacturer produces the goods. There's still time to back our project and get a discount on our travel gear, which we plan to start delivering in July 2018. Lock in a great deal on our bags and accessories by pledging today! 

 We'd love to chat. We respond fastest on Facebook!

Otherwise, you can contact us via email: press@arcido.com

You can find a link to our press kit here. If you can't find what you need, please contact us on Facebook or by email: press@arcido.com.
