story:
Short Summary

Joe,  Armand, Josh, and I have over 100 years of experience in this product category - we created the first tracking device ever designed to be used on airlines for checked-in luggage - and the BSAF device, once again, will be the only tracking device fully compliant with the new airline mandates on the use of these type devices.

We are most passionate about the design of a tracking device capable of creating peace of mind when traveling or being aware of the location of special needs family members.

We have invested significant financial resources and time in bringing the BSAF product to this stage and now need your help to complete the work and bring it to life. We are ready to produce 100 prototype BSAF devices to be used by airline travelers and those who have family members with special needs such as Alzheimer's and Autism. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need approximately $100,000 to complete the Alpha test, certification attainment - FCC and airlines, supporting website and apps, and final packaging / tooling to make it ready for prototype production. This funding will be utilized over a 90 day period.

We created the Perks for your support by providing meaningful discounts on the overall price value when the BSAF product goes to market. From what we learned with the first of our successful products, at least two devices are needed to cover most "checked baggage" travel experiences.  Therefore, we believe our 2 pack Device Perk makes a lot of sense for sharing a device within the family.

If our funding goal is not entirely met, we will continue to work with our engineering team and get to market, however, that will delay the ultimate product delivery to the market. So, again, if our funding goal is not reached, we will look to find equity incentive programs with our suppliers to enable us to complete this final stage.  And, of course, we can go back to our own families for more support.  But, we will achieve this final stage.

The Impact

Four billion units of luggage are checked-in annually on airline flights worldwide; 80 million arrive late, 17 million never arrive.   Though widely attributed to airline negligence, this usually occurs because, according to travel load, the 2-D bar code system literally runs out of numbers and the system is subsequently reset.  If your bag was in transit and the system reset occurred, it is impossible for the airline to track your bag, period. That's where BSAF steps in.

Additionally, there are 44 million Alzheimer’s patients worldwide, 47.5 million living with dementia, and 76 million people living with autism.

Whether you are a frequent airline traveler, parent or caretaker of a special needs family member, the BSAF device is designed for you.

Our first product, Trakdot Luggage Tracker, was voted #1 new product introduction at the 2014 CES Trade Show and went on to sell over 50,000 units worldwide. Ultimately, its lifespan was cut short due to the anticipated rise in Internet of Things technology. As result, we learned a valuable lesson in overcoming obsolescence in the wireless world in which we live.

While we know and understand the anxiety that goes with lost luggage, the four of us felt that the next generation of tracking devices - BSAF - needed to do more.   Which is why we chose to address special needs family members.  Knowing where a loved one is at all times when needed can bring no greater peace of mind.

Risks & Challenges

Challenges and risks come from many directions, be it changes in technology, regulations and competitors.  Our experience with Trakdot faced all of these right up through its successful launch.

We are collaborating with one of the world's largest contract manufacturers for the software engineering of BSAF - that should address the technology challenge. We have personal relationships with a number of the largest airlines in the world as well as with the regulatory agency of the FAA - that should address the regulations challenge and risk.  Our BSAF has been priced to be as much as 30 - 80% lower cost than competitive devices on the market. We believe this will be a long term competitive advantage for us.

Other Ways You Can Help

Now that you understand a little more about what BSAF is all about and our mission to provide an affordable tracking device for awareness and peace of mind, we would love for you to share with us your ideas for what other uses you would see for the BSAF that we could consider in this final stage of development before we begin producing the prototype devices.

That's where BSAF steps in.Additionally, there are 44 million Alzheimer’s patients worldwide, 47.5 million living with dementia, and 76 million people living with autism.Whether you are a frequent airline traveler, parent or caretaker of a special needs family member, the BSAF device is designed for you.Our first product, Trakdot Luggage Tracker, was voted #1 new product introduction at the 2014 CES Trade Show and went on to sell over 50,000 units worldwide. Ultimately, its lifespan was cut short due to the anticipated rise in Internet of Things technology. As result, we learned a valuable lesson in overcoming obsolescence in the wireless world in which we live.While we know and understand the anxiety that goes with lost luggage, the four of us felt that the next generation of tracking devices - BSAF - needed to do more.   Which is why we chose to address special needs family members.  Knowing where a loved one is at all times when needed can bring no greater peace of mind.Risks & ChallengesChallenges and risks come from many directions, be it changes in technology, regulations and competitors.  Our experience with Trakdot faced all of these right up through its successful launch.We are collaborating with one of the world's largest contract manufacturers for the software engineering of BSAF - that should address the technology challenge. We have personal relationships with a number of the largest airlines in the world as well as with the regulatory agency of the FAA - that should address the regulations challenge and risk.  Our BSAF has been priced to be as much as 30 - 80% lower cost than competitive devices on the market. We believe this will be a long term competitive advantage for us.Other Ways You Can HelpNow that you understand a little more about what BSAF is all about and our mission to provide an affordable tracking device for awareness and peace of mind, we would love for you to share with us your ideas for what other uses you would see for the BSAF that we could consider in this final stage of development before we begin producing the prototype devices.

story:
Turn on the audio for this one! You will thank us later! :))

FITNESS, YOGA – Socks, flip-flops, running shoes. Skinners disrupt this trinity of gym footwear and combine the advantages of each – the freedom of a sock, the great grip and the basic protection of shoes.

 

 

TRAVELLING – That 10-hour flight or bus ride can be tough on your feet – trapped in shoes simply because you can’t take them off due to the cold, dirty ground or embarrassing odor.

 

CAMPING, HIKING – Those 4-pounds boots got the job done on that 20-mile hike but now it’s time to take off those heavy casts and give your feet a rest. Skinners let you move around the campground without getting dirty, wet or stung.

 

RUNNING, ATHLETICS – Enrich your training on natural or soft surfaces and activate all your foot muscles and tendons. Skinners simulates the barefoot experience and forces your feet to adapt to the terrain. A strong athlete starts with strong feet.

 

OFFICE – We love your fashionable high-heels and Oxfords :). But usually 6 hours out of 8 at the air-conditioned office you are hiding them under the desk. And to be honest, because of comfort it's possible they end up next to your cold, dirty ground touching feet. Don't risk getting cold and tune up your work performance with Skinners! 

 

ROLLER BLADING – Getting to the bike path, descending hills or getting over other obstacles in the way can be tough. But who wants to spend the whole ride with a sweaty back from carrying their spare shoes around?

 

SIMPLY ANYWHERE… take Skinners on your next walk with your dog, use them around the house or just at home. Take them to a beach-volleyball game, slackline, yoga session or wherever you want. The possibilities are endless…

 

Just like da Vinci, we believe that your foot has all the technology you need. We invented Skinners to keep this masterpiece effectively protected and at the same time support all of the amazing things it can already do.

Skinners are handmade in the heart of Europe and are produced without harming people, animals or the environment (vegan and barefoot friendly).

Please remember, Skinners provide basic protection to your feet and are not a full-time substitute for regular footwear. Proper and reasonable use is strictly advised.

Patent-pending technology, patent-pending design.

Thank you for your support! :)
story_txt:
New collection available on www.skinners.cc :)

To enhance our performance, move faster and go farther, man has invented a lot of special kinds of footwear: rollerblades, cycling shoes, cleats, climbing shoes, heavy-duty hiking boots etc. But all too often this footwear is so specialized that we are forced to sacrifice on comfort, convenience, and even safety. To overcome the limits, where footwear starts to be a burden rather than a benefit, we developed Skinners – ultraportable footwear for every adventure.

 Just like da Vinci, we believe that your foot has all the technology you need. We invented Skinners to keep this masterpiece effectively protected and at the same time support all of the amazing things it can already do.Skinners are handmade in the heart of Europe and are produced without harming people, animals or the environment (vegan and barefoot friendly).

Follow us:
Instagram                    FacebookInterested in writing about us and our mission? Feel free to email us directly on hello@skinners.cc. 
Please remember, Skinners provide basic protection to your feet and are not a full-time substitute for regular footwear. Proper and reasonable use is strictly advised.Patent-pending technology, patent-pending design.Thank you for your support! :)

story:
Every day when you drink coffee, you might get burned because it is too hot. Or it might get cold too fast for you to enjoy it for a longer time. Either way, the temperature of the coffee is most of the times not right.

For these problems, we have designed "One Cup" - the cup that can control the temperature of coffee.

First, "One Cup" absorbs the extra thermal energy of coffee when the coffee is too hot and cools it down to drinkable temperature 3 times faster than an ordinary cup.

Next, "One Cup" releases the stored energy back into the coffee when the coffee gets cold and keeps it to a drinkable temperature 2 times longer than an ordinary cup.

The amazing performance is owed to a special material sealed within the advanced ceramics shell. This material is designed to intelligently absorb & release the extra thermal energy of the coffee. This is how "One Cup" always keeps your coffee temperature just right.

You will love "One Cup" especially with hot coffee, hot tea, hot chocolate and any other hot drink you like.

All the material tech comes from NASA Tech. We have sent all the material to professional organization to be analysed to ensure it's safe.

We have been working hard for over 2 years to design & test "One Cup", and ready to take it into production. Therefore we received over 100 million dollars investment from Venture Capital.

In this way, we would have to consider more the earnings, instead on providing a good product to everyone. We want to focus on the product and share it with the world in a better way. So we have decided to refuse the investment and to start the project on Indiegogo.

Nobody can create a great product, without your support. We are ready to work on the "One Cup" project together with you, the people that will benefit from this amazing product. Fitting perfect in your life, at home or at the office, "One Cup" will be that perfect cup of coffee you enjoy!

For a 3 dollar cup of coffee, a coffee farmer only earns 3 cents. The price paid to coffee farmers remains so low that they can't afford to improve the living & educational environment for their children.

So we initiated "One Project":

For every "One Cup" you support, we will support 1 dollar to the "One Fund"! And "One Fund" will be used to improve the living & educational environment for the children of coffee farmers.

"One Cup" lets you feel warm, and doesn’t let the warmth subside. Let's send the warmth to the people who also need it!

We will invite Kenya Hara to designer special "One Cup" editions. Kenya Hara is the chief design director of MUJI. He is a Japanese worldwide famous leading designer.

This special edition is also called Seasons Edition. It consists of a group of 8 special designed "One Cup"s. For each season, there will be 2 "One Cup"s which will be shipped to you.

If you want to enjoy a perfect coffee from one of the Famous Designer Edition(Seasons Edition) cups, please select the perk on the right side of web page. The Famous Designer Edition(Seasons Edition) is a secret edition, the prototype will be revealed in September.

The price of "One Cup" on indiegogo campaigns is lower than retail & online launch, so claim your perk quickly!

Please choose the edition and mention the color you want on the right side of web page.

Two color options you can select are Gold and Silver.

Editions you can choose:

All editions benefit from free international shipping, and will be sent to you as soon as possible.

As part of our funding perks, we will offer a Japanese ceramics tour to discover the Japanese culture around ceramics.

Japanese ceramics has been developing in close relation to other forms of Japanese culture such as Sushi, Sake, Kaiseki, and Tea Ceremony. Here we offer some itineraries which will give you the chance to experience some of these most traditional of Japanese cultural activities.

Our Japanese ceramics tour is designed for anyone interested in the ceramics art of Japan. On this journey we’ll discover the beauty of both the lush countryside and the incredible ceramics of Japan. Joining our Japan-based art with such a wonderful tour, you'll return home with an education in Japan culture.

Don't miss enjoying any of these distinctive cultural aspects when traveling in Japan.

1. What are the shipping costs?

A: All shippings are free of charge. You don't need to worry about shipping, we will send "One Cup" to you by best shipping way.

2. When is the soonest I can get "One Cup"?

A: After indiegogo campaign is ended, we will send "One Cup" to every supporter of our campaign.

3. What is the technology behind "One Cup", is it safe?

A: All the material tech comes from NASA Tech. We have sent all the material to professional organization to be analysed to ensure it's safe.

4. Is there any other capacity of "One Cup"?

A: All edition's capacity is designed for coffee, so currently only one capacity. We will provide more capacities to you in the future.

5. What if my question isn’t answered here?

A: You can email us at: OneCupTeam@onecuppro.com

story:
My campaign has reached 100%! Thank you all SO much for the donations and social media posts. I am overjoyed. 

Any future contributions will be used towards upgrading my camera equipment and car expenses along the way. Only a few weeks left to go!

We Have Only Today 

Hello! I am a dreamer, artist, and photographer currently living in North Carolina. Ever since I was a little girl I've dreamed of traveling, especially throughout the United States.

With school, jobs, and everything else, life has always gotten in the way of my plan to complete a photo documentary project of this place I call home. This spring and summer I have finally made the commitment to do the trip, living and working on organic farms along the way.

“Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.” 

-Mother Teresa

My Big Plans

WWOOF is an international organization that will provide housing and meals for me in exchange for work on various organic farms. Having grown up on a small mountain farm and passionate about food and sustainable practices; bee-keeping, dairy, and vegetables are a few areas I want to learn more about.

Along the way I will photograph the people and places I see with my personal camera equipment and your contribution will help me fulfill my dream . Inspired by Robert Frank and two close friends that completed a similar venture shooting with film, I want to capture what life in America is like today but with a focus on small towns; from the deep south to the northwest.

The Bare Essentials 

Family, friends, and friends of friends have graciously offered their floors and/or couches for me to crash on here and there in between farms. I will also probably be doing a lot of camping and staying in hostels. My ‘97 Corolla has gotten the ok from my dad and the mechanic (at least for the next few thousand miles) so now it’s time to plan out the details. 

Stuffing the next few months of my life into my trunk with only a strong feeling that I'm doing the right thing isn't easy, but I am so excited to get on the road. 

My budget includes everything I need to keep up with bills (insurance, cell phone, etc) as well as meals, sightseeing, sleeping arrangements if needed, and emergency situations. 

While the cost of gasoline will undoubtedly rise once warm weather rolls around, my car does get great mileage. $1500.00 is a pretty close estimate of what it will take for the 9,000 mile itinerary I have planned.

As you can see from this map, I'm going to be covering a lot of highway. While I've been saving, and while my budget does include for cell phone/insurance/tires etc., I am counting on donations to make this trip possible by taking care of the cost of gas.

Past Experiences and Future Plans

In 2011 I graduated with a BFA in Art and have assisted and freelanced ever since. Previous photography projects I have completed have been shown in galleries internationally as well as featured in numerous blogs and magazine interviews. 

Once I have completed the trip I have every intention of publishing a photography book of my travels that shows the kindness of the American people and the beauty our country has to offer. My hope is to also exhibit the work in various galleries to raise awareness about the positive impact small farms have on our culture and health. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially but can share my story on social media sites, tell your friends, or have any recommendations of places to see please let me know! Any little bit of funding or advice will help.

Please feel free to visit my website, ameliafletcher.com, to see more of my portfolio or email me directly at ahfletcher3@gmail.com. 

I hope my experience, and the photographs that result, will inspire you to visit these amazing places and meet incredible people yourself.

Thank you for taking the time to read about my adventure!

story:
My Bag is Quite a Swimmer, Yours?

Waterproof & Floating Test

 

The Most Functional Backpack Ever！  

Inflatable-Floatable-Waterproof- Modular  

The Next Innovation backpack is designed for the extreme conditions, but also with a minimalistic modern aesthetic that creating a sleek and chic look. It’s more than just an outdoor backpack, it’s an everyday backpack that works as well in urban lifestyle, and it does things other backpack can’t.  

Color: Grey

Floats fully packed

 

  Inflatable

 

 

Comparison with other outdoor backpack

Dimensions: 20"x 14"x 9.5"(Max)  

 Air-tight zipper protects your gears and electronic equipment from water, also keeps the air in the bag to make it floatable. Plus, the air tightness adds an anti-theft concept to the bag. It is hard to open your bag without getting attention.

 Reflective strip: allows to be seen at night to keep your safety.

 Padded anti-crush back

 Padded ergonomic straps allow a perfect fit along your body and support for heavy load. Adjustable sternum straps come with a multi-function buckle, including whistle and other upcoming features.

 Removable easy-to-reach body access pocket for small items.

 

Modular

The MODULAR design allows you to easy switch, swap, merge and separate by the connected zipper. Effortless to go from an understated urban style backpack to a travel style.

Urban Lifestyle

Commuter's Backpack

 Double Deck

 Perfect for everyone to organize your life.

Traveller's Backpack

 

 Triple Deck

  With all the space and organization necessary for up to seven days of travel

 Fit as a carry-on bag when flying

When we say "go to the airport", you imagine

 

 

This is how our backpack changes your life

 

Add-on items/ easy-to-reach fast check pocket

 Outer Bag

Upper Layer

 Removable organization panel for small items.

 Easy switch storage for your glasses or earphone. 

 

 Easy switch storage for your glasses or earphone.  

Lower layer

Portable Solar Charger Pocket or Wet Items Storage

 Cable tunnel for your portable charger.

Central bag

 

Unique pillow function for camping and waterproof construction

 With a side carry handle, the central bag can be used individually, or as a waterproof internal bag in your suitcase.

 

Essential Bag

• Padded laptop pocket fits devices up to 17".  

• Padded slot for tablet.  

• Keep your digital devices from rain and snow. 

Upcoming Features  

Shoulder strap interior slot pockets with a built-in retractable key chain, and will fit your subway card or other small goods.  

Multi-function buckle with compass, thermometer and flint, perfect for your outdoor activities. 

Our Story  

 Next Innovation is a lifestyle and water sport hardware company created in 2015. We are water sports enthusiasts ourselves, which means we made sure every possible useful feature a backpack could have is included.  

 We noticed that, in a professional SUP boards competition, life jackets are always required by law. While lifejackets are always the best, you can't wear them everywhere and a lot of people don't use them while in the outdoors kayaking, stand up paddle boarding or just out on the water having fun. We wanted to make a backpack that would be an alternative so people can still live the adventure but with less risk.  

 Motivated to create a product that would empower people to embrace life worry-free, we designed the Next Innovation backpack to be an inflatable flotation device. Our backers will also have everything they need safely secured inside, and they look good at the same time.  

 The WHO reported that 372,000 people drown worldwide each year, which is 7% of all injury related deaths. Wanting to help, we created the Next Innovation backpack, and we will donate $1 to Red Cross Hurricane Relief each backpack we sell.  

Please note that according to Kickstarter rules, we are not allowed to use projects fundraise for charity. We will certainly support our beneficiary orgs outside of Kickstarter and share all the information with our backer community.  

In The Future  

The backpack X-in-1 set Zip Pack Go.  

X-in-1? The possibilities of Next Innovation are infinite.  

There are more color options and functions on the way that will be added to the life changing appeal of this backpack like internal removable organization, perfect for storing photograph gear, small travel items, or other things. Backers will also be able to customize the different internal organization.

Risks and challenges

There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life. We are working on upgrading the waterproof material to be more durable and look fashionable at the same time. And we are also adding more functions and developing different removable parts to make the bag more customizable and incomparable before shipment.

Timing is always a challenge for developing of the new functions. However, we can confidently say that we are expert in the productive process, also have developed systems and processes to mitigate the risks and obstacles that will arise. We will work hard to ensure that we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile whenever it is possible.

Thanks for believing in us!

Wanting to help, we created the Next Innovation backpack, and we will donate $1 to Red Cross Hurricane Relief each backpack we sell.  Please note that according to Kickstarter rules, we are not allowed to use projects fundraise for charity. We will certainly support our beneficiary orgs outside of Kickstarter and share all the information with our backer community.  In The Future  The backpack X-in-1 set Zip Pack Go.  X-in-1? The possibilities of Next Innovation are infinite.  There are more color options and functions on the way that will be added to the life changing appeal of this backpack like internal removable organization, perfect for storing photograph gear, small travel items, or other things. Backers will also be able to customize the different internal organization.Risks and challengesThere are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life. We are working on upgrading the waterproof material to be more durable and look fashionable at the same time. And we are also adding more functions and developing different removable parts to make the bag more customizable and incomparable before shipment.Timing is always a challenge for developing of the new functions. However, we can confidently say that we are expert in the productive process, also have developed systems and processes to mitigate the risks and obstacles that will arise. We will work hard to ensure that we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile whenever it is possible.Thanks for believing in us!

story:
*Get your Manta Sleep Mask at http://mantasleep.com

*Our Indiegogo campaign is now over.

 

 

 

 

Manta Sleep Mask is designed to upgrade your sleep & life with a personalized fit.

Manta is the World’s 1st Modular Sleep Mask with FreeFit - so it molds to fit your unique face.

It works for 99% of all face shapes & gives you 100% blackout for your entire sleep cycle...energizing you for wherever life takes you when you wake up.

Regardless of your ethnicity, age, gender, nose shape, or preferred sleeping position, Manta’s patent-pending adjustable modular eye contours create the perfect seal - because it’s specifically tailored to you.

Side sleeper? Belly sleeper? Back sleeper?...we’ve got you covered.

  • Mark Webster (Authority Hacker) 

 

 

 
  • Tristan King (Blackbelt Commerce) 

 

Patent-Pending Modular FreeFit

Experience the Comfort of a Personalized Fit

What if, instead of losing valuable hours of sleep (not to mention cash) trying dozens of different sleep masks, you got it right the first time?

Your work would improve, you’d have more energy to go out, and your body would feel stronger.

Manta Sleep Mask’s modular design, with Patent-Pending omniLAT™, offers an unprecedented level of adjustability that’s easy and intuitive to use.

Because the fit is tailored to you, there’s no extra pressure on your face.

The Modular Eye Contours can be adjusted freely to create a customized fit for 99% of all face shapes - including yours.

 

 

100% Total Darkness for the Entire 8 Hours

Sleep, Uninterrupted

What if you could sleep through the entire night without waking up even once? Imagine how much better rested you’d feel in the morning.

Thanks to the 100% total blackout of the Manta Sleep Mask, you won’t experience any light leakage, meaning you’ll finally be able to sleep through the night.

Regardless of your sleep position or the shape of your nose, Manta conforms to your face (and keeps the light out).

Side sleeper? Belly sleeper? Back sleeper? We’ve got you covered.

 

   

The luxurious foam contour snugly conforms to the sides of your face, making sleep on your side & belly more comfortable.

 

There is NO light leakage with Manta.

 

Eye Contours for REM Sleep

Spend Less Time Sleeping & Feel More Energetic

Rapid Eye Movement (REM) sleep is when your brain is repaired and renewed.

If you need more energy and want to feel well-rested in the morning, focus on getting more REM sleep.

During REM sleep, your eyes experience rapid movements in random directions. Most sleep masks press against your face and eyes, which can interrupt this process.

Manta has specially designed eye contours that encourage REM sleep.

Because there is no direct contact or pressure on your eyelids, your REM cycle won’t be interrupted.

Eye contours do not press against your eyelids, which allow REM sleep to occur.

 

  

 

Since we designed Manta Sleep Mask for ourselves, we went all out to bring you even more sleep-enhancing features.

No more hair-pulling. No more pain. Micro velcro will not stick to your hair.

 

Cotton interior ensures Breathability & Comfort. Manta feels Light & Cool.

 

The 2 sections of the headband are made from elastics, which give you -extra comfort- as the product will STRETCH to fit your head. Limiting the elastics to only these 2 sections prevents the entire band from stretching loose with use.

 

The total length of the product is 71cm, which will fit 99% of all head sizes. The strap is made out of plush cotton velour, so it’s soft & comfortable against your head and ears.

 

Lightweight construction. Manta Sleep Mask is great to use while sitting up straight (such as on a plane).

 

The silicone grip pad on the back of the mask prevents it from slipping off your head during sleep.

 

Manta earplugs are made with memory foam to block out sound.

 

You’re going to love the Manta Pouch. Its separated earplug compartment with a zipped closure ensures you’ll never lose your earplugs again.

 

The mesh design has 2 advantages: 

  • The pouch doubles as a laundry mesh net, so you can machine wash your eye mask without damaging it. The mesh net will significantly extend the life of your Manta Mask. 
  • The pouch also airs out your Manta Sleep Mask when in storage or during your travels. This improves hygiene and prevents odor buildup.

 

ALL YOU – YOUR WANDERLUST

What if you could take advantage of everything your travels have to offer, without running out of energy? Imagine how much more epic & memorable your adventures would be.

Traveling is very disruptive to your sleep quality. Those hours on a plane and adjusting to a new time zone leave you with low energy levels.

Seasoned travelers know that the trick is to catch sleep whenever and wherever you can - be it on the plane, bus, boat, or just a good old couch.

Unfortunately, sleeping conditions on the road are often less than ideal.

That’s where Manta Sleep Mask comes in.

  • Madaline Lorelle (Couple’s Quest)

 

ALL YOU – YOUR POWER NAP

What if, instead of getting coffee 3 times a day, you could get a sustained energy boost? You’d feel like a “million bucks” before even pitching that major deal.

Taking a 30-minute power nap is one of the best ways to recharge yourself in the middle of a busy day.

Despite the short duration, you wake up feeling sharper, stronger, & ready to close the deal.

The problem is, your body has trouble napping under fluorescent light found in the office. This is where Manta comes in.

  • Chris Kim (Hilltop Stores)

 

ALL YOU – YOUR ZEN

What if you could escape from a day of lazy lethargy without overdosing on energy drinks? Imagine how present you’d feel.

Meditation is an exercise for the soul, leading to increased mindfulness and better rest.

Unfortunately, distractions abound in our daily lives.

Every once awhile, it’s important to let go and to try to clear our minds. This is where Manta Sleep Mask comes in.

  • Jamon Yerger

 

ALL YOU – YOUR SLEEP-IN

If you only have one day to sleep in, the last thing you want is for the morning sun to wake you up before you’re ready.

Morning light coming in through the window is a major disruption to your sleep, especially if your body hasn’t had enough time to get fully rested.

With our modern lifestyle of going to bed well after sunset, it’s difficult, if not impossible, for our body to get enough rest before sunrise.

And let’s face it: we all just want to sleep in every once in awhile.

This is where Manta comes in.

  • Benjamin Tong (Business Owner)

 

ALL YOU - YOUR NIGHT SHIFT

What if you could feel rested and have a social life, even while working vampiric hours? Imagine how much healthier you’d be, both emotionally and physically.

According to WebMD, “there is strong evidence that shift work is related to a number of serious health conditions, like cardiovascular disease, diabetes, and obesity.”

Sleep disturbances and loss only worsen these conditions.

It’s extremely important for night shift workers to create total darkness during the day - and curtains alone simply aren’t enough.

This is where Manta comes in.

  • Zak Columber (Gingerbread Marketing)

 

ALL YOU - YOUR LIFE (UPGRADED)

What if you could maximize your life, without needing to sleep more hours? Imagine how much more productive you’d be.

While it’s ideal to get 8 hours of sleep, let’s get real: with work responsibilities, social obligations, and family gatherings getting in the way, there’s no way it’s happening every night.

In these situations, all you can do is to maximize the sleep time that you do have and to upgrade your sleep quality.

How rested you feel doesn’t depend on just the duration of your sleep, but also on the quality of it.

The faster you can go into, and the longer you can stay in, REM sleep, the less amount of sleep you need.

Manta Sleep Mask upgrades your sleep quality and gets you into REM sleep faster.

  • Till Carlos (Maerketing.com)

 

You are young. You are ambitious. You are adventurous. You want to enjoy life to the fullest and experience all that the world has to offer.

But you can’t do it unless you’re getting quality sleep in between your adventures.

You can only work hard and play hard when you’ve got an abundance of energy and vitality from a good night’s sleep...or a power nap [or two].

Using a sleep mask is a great way to improve sleep quality. The problem is, common products on the market take a one-size-fits-all approach.

Your face and nose shape are unique. Why shouldn’t the sleep mask you use be, too?

Most eye masks force you to sacrifice fit, comfort, or quality.

You shouldn’t need to make sacrifices when it comes to sleep.

So, as product designers with over 10 years of experience, who have used dozens of sleep masks in the past 15 years of our lives, we made something better.

 

 

Manta Sleep Mask's modular design offers endless possibilities. Here are just some of the products we have on the roadmap.

 

 

It’s time for YOU to take control. Upgrade your sleep. Upgrade your life. Never Let Poor Sleep Interfere With Your Epic Lifestyle Again.

Your support will help us scale up production to bring Manta Sleep Mask to market. To achieve cost efficiency, we need to purchase raw material in bulk, which requires serious capital.

Take back your sleep by backing Manta Mask today.

PS: Take advantage of our Indiegogo offer, which is up to 50% off the retail price.

  • Vincent Ko (Business Owner)

story:
Short Summary

Alternative Spring Break makes it possible for UVA Law students, who are willing to donate their time during Spring Break, to make an impact providing legal services all around the country. For our trip, twelve UVA Law students plan to work with the Orleans Public Defenders to provide legal services to low-income people accused of crimes in Orleans Parish, Louisiana. 

The Orleans Public Defenders Office (OPD) exists to provide the citizens of Orleans Parish with the highest quality client-centered legal representation in Louisiana’s criminal and juvenile justice system. Their vision is to create a community-oriented defender office built upon the zealous defense of the poor and indigent while acknowledging the strengths of clients, families and communities.

The work being done at the OPD is crucial to ensuring a balanced justice system, where the poor have equal access to high quality representation. In the past, students have helped with a variety of cases, researching precedent, writing memos and observing trials.

Students will also be helping out in places like Bronx, NY and Washington, DC, but the trip to New Orleans will require a lot of money for travel, food and lodging. That's where you can help.

What We Need

We aim to raise $2,000 on Indiegogo. This will fund transportation and lodging for the 12 students going on this trip.

You can check out students' experiences on past trips here for more information on the program.

Thank you for considering donating to our Alternative Spring Break trip!

story:
The Paint Kit for Long Hauls or Short Hops

Plein air painting is a rapidly growing art discipline by which artists create on location. Since location painters have to carry their art supplies with them every time they step out the door, they have to be organized. Unfortunately, art and organized and are two words not often spoken over the visually creative crowd. As a plein air painter myself, I've experienced the frustration of landing on a site and not having a paintbrush or other necessary tool.

So, I finally decided to do something about it.

Keni Kit is the result.

  • Keni Kit has been refined to remove common (and not-so-common) obstacles to painting on location.
  • Keni Kit has undergone rigorous field tests over the past year.
  • Keni Kit works great, even in the most confined spaces.

 


The Long Haul (painted in-kit from the window seat)

  • Rapid Setup: Simply open the hinged lid, flip out the trays, pick up tools and begin creating within seconds. Fast startup is accomplished by having all essential artists tools and supplies within the Kit. Artwork can be created completely within the Kit. When finished, simply close the kit and go.
  • Versatility and Extensive Configuration. Palette container options allow various media to easily be switched out. Use the kit for watercolor one day, gouache the next or simply for sketching. The Kit is tripod mountable, plus has an optional secure hand-holder attachment that allows the artist to draw or paint while standing. Additional unique features include  water evacuation system, brush holders and easel extender.
  • Portability: The Kit is small, lightweight and easy to carry. This kit is the ideal companion for traveling abroad or traveling around town.

 

The Short Hop (painted in-kit in a moving car)

Take a Stand

No place to sit? With Keni Kit, you can easily and quickly create your artwork while standing. Stop the drops: The secure holder keeps the kit in your hand; preventing it from crashing to the floor.
 

What Other Artists Are Saying

"Keni Kit is wonderful discovery, I will be carrying a Keni Kit to be used on my future plein air excursions, and my vacations at home and abroad. Color Me Happy!" Urania Christy Tarbet

"Keni Kit is truly beautiful. Its compact and logical design enables you to create beauty seamlessly and without fuss wherever you go." Audra Esch

"I have used the Keni Kit and found it easy and practical to use. As the popularity of urban sketching continues to grow, I think many people will be looking for compact kits such as this that don’t require hauling around a lot of equipment.​"  Pete Morris

What We Need

With a prototype in hand, there's one urgent and necessary step before having it manufactured. I need to have my digital (stl) files converted into CAD (sldprt) files. The CAD files are used to make injection molds.

What You Get

For your generous support, I have some special 'Thank you' gifts.

The Impact

Our motto: 'The Complete Kit At Your Fingertips'. Once equipped, all your favorite art supplies will be ready at an instance for the artist or doodler to create a masterpiece or jot a visual note.

Risks & Challenges

Having worked for over 25 years in the entertainment industry, I've seen my share of challenges. However, the adage, The show must go on' is one we lived by. As a lead painter in the studios, I never delivered a set unfinished, even though (on just a few occasions) the paint was still drying when the cameras rolled in:-0

My design and testing work on the Kit is complete. It's now a matter of raising the funds, then collaborating with manufacturers and others to produce the Kit.

Other Ways You Can Help

I hope you can contribute financially. Even if you can't, you can still help.

  • Help get the word out; make some noise about Keni Kit.
  • Include links to this campaign.
  • Pray for its success.

Thanks from Team Keni & Peggie

story:
New booming winter sport! 
A combination of skis and skates, that brings the joy of skating to the snow.
It’s basically like ice-skating on snow.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Skiskates attach to any ski boots or snowboard boots depending on the model you choose.

 

 

 

Skiskates models are available in two elegant colors - black and white.

 


 

 


 

 

 

 

 

What if ski resorts are closed during winter of 2020/21?

Take Skiskates on a hike and slide down the narrow hiking trails and forest paths. This is our favourite way to use them. Have fun on your local sledding hill or enjoy bobsledding along with your kids on your backyard hill. You could also try Skiskates on groomed Cross-country trails. 

 

 

 

 
 
 
 

 

 

 
 

There’s so much you can do with Skiskates. All kinds of twists, jumps, tricks and so much more! Be creative! Your imagination is your limit!

 

 

Skiskates are perfect for changing things up on your ski trips and enjoying the slopes in a unique and fun way. Experience snow parks in a completely new way with all kinds of new jumps and tricks.

 

 

 

Take these mini skis on a hike and slide down narrow hiking trails and forest paths like never before. Have fun on your local sledding hill or in your backyard with your friends and kids.

 

 

 

Skiskating with Skiskates is actually pretty easy.

It is as hard as learning to ski or skate. In fact, many people find it even easier.
However, it takes some time and you will definitely fall now and then,
but that’s part of the fun. 

 

 
 
 
They’re small enough to fit in a backpack, so you can take them pretty much anywhere!
 
 
 
 
 

 

You could think of Skiskates as the world’s shortest skis.

Their length is only 44 cm / 17 Inch.

 

 

     

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

You can use Skiskates with ski boots or snowboard boots of most sizes.

 

One Size fits all.
We recommend Skiskates for ski boots of size:
 36-49 EU / 4.5-14.5 US / (22,5-32,5 MP/Ski boot size)

 
 

One Size fits all.
We recommend Skiskates for snowboard boots of size:
 38 - 49 EU / 6 - 14.5 US
 

 

 
 
 
 

Snowfeet is basically a predecessor of Skiskates.
They attach to any winter shoes or snowboard boots with bindings. 
Snowfeet are great for downhill skiing on ski slopes, hiking trails
or just to have fun on your local sledding hill.


You can choose from these models: 

Snowfeet Basic, Snowfeet II, and Snowfeet X.

 

 

Just add Snowfeet to your order in the checkout process. 


Snowfeet are combination of skis and skates, that brings the thrill of skating to the slopes! Snowfeet attach right to your winter shoes or snowboard boots.  They fit into a  backpack, so you can take them anywhere.  One size fits all. 
 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 

Of course, Skiskates are not perfect and we're not scared to admit that, because most of our customers are super delighted with their purchase anyway. Here are some downsides you should be aware of before you buy Skiskates:

 

Do all ski resorts allow the use of Skiskates on their slopes?

Most of the ski resorts allow this kind of “short skis” on their slopes, but not all of them.
Our experience is that if you act as if you were skiing with your traditional skis, no one will bother you. And if that happens anyway, argue that Skiskates are safe and the base of Skiskates is made of the exact same metal ski edges as all the other skis, which is the most common requirement of ski resorts. And don’t forget the great thing about Skiskates is that you can always use them in so many other places, like hiking trails and sledding hills.

 

Is it hard to learn?

Not really, it is actually pretty easy. It is as hard as learning to ski or skate. In fact, many people find it easier. However it takes some time and you will definitely fall now and then, but that’s part of the fun. Have you ever seen people ice-skating for the first time? That’s what I’m talking about. You have to keep the front-back balance, so it feels very natural to those who play ice hockey, ice skate, or even use inline skates. You are able to move freely as opposed to wearing heavy clunky skis. Falling is generally much safer than falling with skis or snowboard. Most importantly don't forget that learning is effortless if you enjoy the ride.

 

Can I use them in powder?

Skiskates are best on groomed snow. You can use Skiskates on powder that is not thicker than +/- 20 cm (8 in). They are great on ski slopes, snow parks, sliding hills, or hiking trails, just not in deep powder. By the way, most skis are not suited for deep powder snow either. Additionally, try to avoid extremely steep slopes and ungroomed terrain full of bumps and holes.

 

 
 
 
 
 
We run this Indiegogo project in cooperation with our great partner company What To Fund, LLC based in Ogden, UT.

Most of our team and our manufacturing is based in the heart of Europe, the Czech republic. We're proud to manufacture Skiskates locally in a country with a long tradition of manufacturing one of the best skis in the world! We are a small company of friends and family from a small town having a global ambition of creating the next big winter sport.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 

 

What shoe size should I use?

One size fits all, so don’t worry.

However, we recommend Skiskates for Snowboard boots of size: 6-14.5 US / 38-49 EU. 
Ski boots model is also one size fits all. We recommend size range: 36-49 EU / 4.5-14.5 US / 22,5-32,5 MP. Adjustable bindings let you attach Skiskates to any Snowboard boot or Ski boot, depending on model of Skiskates you choose.

 

What shoes should I use?

Use any ski boots or snowboard boots depending on model of Skiskates you choose. We recommend waterproof quality boots that fix your ankle firmly.

 

Is it hard to learn?

Not really, it is actually pretty easy. It is as hard as learning to ski or skate.
In fact, many people find it easier. However it takes some time and you will definitely fall now and then, but that’s part of the fun. Have you ever seen people ice-skating for the first time? That’s what I’m talking about. You have to keep the front-back balance, so it feels very natural to those who play ice hockey, ice skate, or even use inline skates. You are able to move freely as opposed to wearing heavy clunky skis. Falling is generally much safer than falling with skis or snowboard. Most importantly don't forget that learning is effortless if you enjoy the ride.

 

How do you stop?

You can stop the same way that you stop with your skis or skates. This is also called a hockey stop. Because of their size and weight, it might not be as easy to stop with Skiskates as it is with regular skis. However, it's not really difficult either. Make sure you distribute your weight evenly over both of your Skiskates to make you stop easier and slower. Additionally, you can also slow down using a heel brake.

 

How much is shipping?

Depending on the country you are from, $19 - $49 / 1 Pair. 

 

What is your return policy?

We give you a 30 Day Money Back Guarantee because we believe in our product. Make sure that the product is unused and in the original state.

 

Can I use them in powder?

Skiskates are best on groomed snow. You can use Skiskates on powder that is not thicker
than +/- 20 cm (8 in). They are great on ski slopes, snow parks, sliding hills, or hiking trails, just not in deep powder. By the way, most skis are not suited for deep powder snow either. Additionally, try to avoid extremely steep slopes and ungroomed terrain full of bumps and holes.

 

Do all ski resorts allow the use of Skiskates on their slopes?

Most of the ski resorts allow this kind of “short skis” on their slopes, but not all of them.
Our experience is that if you act as if you were skiing with your traditional skis, no one will bother you. And if that happens anyway, argue that Skiskates are safe and the base of Skiskates is made of the exact same metal ski edges as all the other skis, which is the most common requirement of ski resorts. And don’t forget the great thing about Skiskates is that you can always use them in so many other places, like hiking trails and sledding hills.

 

Should I use wax?

Of course, we recommend waxing the base regularly to make Skiskates even faster and prevent snow from sticking to the base. While you are on a ski trip, wax the base every day.

 

 

 



Terms and Conditions and Disclaimer

Some aspects of skiing and related activities are potentially dangerous. Any person using Skiskates is personally responsible for learning a safe way to ski, assumes all risks and accepts complete responsibility for any and all damages and injuries of any kind, which may result from use of this product. Skiing involves the general risk of injury. It is necessary to follow the rules of safe skiing. Safety of a child skiing with Skiskates is a responsibility of the supervising person.

Not for children under 7 years of age. There is a danger of injury when speed or direction mistake occurs. The product Skiskates should be used on a sufficient layer of snow, on hills and terrains with no obstacles, under adult supervision. Beware of other people and obstacles while skiing. The child should use firm footwear, protective gloves, and a helmet. We do not recommend using Skiskates on steep slopes. Always wear protective gear and helmet.

The Skiskates product is made of plastic. Do not use the product if it is damaged. Do not expose the product to temperatures over 40 °C or under - 20 °C, as these temperatures can cause irreversible damage to the product. Keep the package of the product away from children, a danger of suffocation in case of pulling the package overhead.

You ought to exercise good judgment and common sense when using Skiskates skis. Snowfeet s.r.o. is not liable for injuries or damages arising from the dangers and risks inherent in this sport. Your safety and the safety of others depend upon your cautious and careful use of your Skiskates skis.

Designs showed in this video are either previous models or prototypes. The original version that you buy might be different from the prototype.

By purchasing you agree with these Terms and conditions and confirm you have read the Disclaimer.

story:
#OneTeamOneDream

The Philadelphia Mans Basketball League (PMBL) hopes you will join us in helping make possible the Third Annual Treasure Beach Jamaican Youth Basketball Camp in St. Elizabeth Parish, Jamaica. Your generous support will make this summer's camp a huge success!!

Over the five-day camp, to be held from August 24th through August 28th 2015, 400 of the island's under-served and underprivileged rural youths (ages 5-18) will participate in individual and group clinics, shooting and skills competitions, team practices, and games. The coaches and camp counselors will include current NCAA coaches, former Division 1 NCAA basketball players, current Philadelphia high school coaches, and many of the of the young professionals who help comprise the PMBL.

With your assistance, the PMBL, will provide each camper with daily bus transportation to and from the camp, three meals a day, sneakers, socks, reversible jerseys, basketball shorts, and basketballs. Donations for this year's camp will also directly fund the Breds Treasure Beach Sports Park and Academy in the form of both equipment and groundskeeping upgrades.


As a result of the fundraising efforts for the previous two PMBL Treasure Beach Jamaican Youth Basketball Camp, we were able to raise enough money to provide solar-powered lighting, an irrigation system for the sports park four (4) portable basketball hoops, four (4) portable weather-proof sets of bleachers, four (4) weather proof portable team benches, and an industrial mower to better improve the grounds of the camp and safety of the children. Your generosity will directly assist the Treasure Beach community by supporting the infrastructure and continued growth of the Breds Treasure Beach Sports Park & Academy. With your help and support we will be able to further the PMBL's mission of using basketball as vehicle for positive change.


What is the Breds Treasure Foundation?

The Breds Treasure Beach Foundation is a wholly volunteer-based charitable organization run by members of the community, for the benefit of the community in Treasure Beach, a small, rural enclave on Jamaica’s undeveloped South Coast where fishing and farming are still common ways of life. 

What the hell is the PMBL???

The Philadelphia Mans Basketball League is a highly competitive league of two hundred and fifty young professional men from the Philadelphia area. The PMBL is comprised of members, age 21-40, who work in the fields of law, medicine, professional sports, pharmaceuticals, hospitality, and real estate. Additionally, the PMBL is unique in that it combines the most popular elements of fantasy sports with high-level recreational athletics. This exciting combination has produced Philadelphia’s most competitive and fastest growing interactive basketball sports and professional network.

          

For realtime updates on all things PMBL Treasure Beach Jamaican Youth Basketball Camp follow us on Facebook, twitter @PMBLeague, and atwww.pmbleague.com

story:
This is Ghost. Ghost is a minimal, high-tech backpack that's perfect for everyday use. 

When we were designing the backpack, not only was our goal to make it aesthetically pleasing, but we also wanted to make it as functional as possible.

  • Built in charger allows you to charge and use your phone when on the go.
  • And if you lose your phone, the backpack will help you locate it.
  • If you lose your backpack, the built in tracker will help you find it.
  • Left strap has a convenient quick access pocket that's perfect for holding your cards or cash.
  • The backpack is cut proof, water proof, anti shock, and anti sweat all thanks to our 7-layer construction.
  • Main compartment is efficient at keeping your stuff safe in an organized way
  • Laptop and tablet pockets are perfect for short trips to a coffee shop or long trips around the world.
  • Electronic hackers can't hack thanks to RFID pockets. 
  • The utility pocket is perfect for storing your wallet, passport, or power bank.
  • Staying hydrated is easy with a water bottle pocket. 

  • (3) Smaller pockets are perfect for your watch, keys, or headphones.


Pick-pocketing: It is one of the oldest and most widespread crimes in the world. A skilled pickpocket can make off with just as much money as an armed robber, without much danger of confrontation or risk of being identified in a line-up. By the time the victim realizes what's happened, the pickpocket is long gone.

All of this is bad news for the rest of us. When you're traveling, a pickpocket can easily ruin your trip. We ourselves have been victim to pick-pocketing, so that's when we decided on making Ghost, the best line of defense against pick-pocketing. Keep your items safe and sound.
 

Hidden 360 zipper: By implementing the zipper in the backside of the bag, you'll only be able to access the bag when the backpack is off your shoulders. Meaning that all your belongings will be exactly where you left them.
 

Secure RFID blocking pockets: Pickpockets don't even actually have to pick your pockets anymore, hackers can access your credit card data wirelessly. So we have a built in measure to stay safe even when you're unaware of a electric hacker. We have added in multiple RFID blocking pockets.
 

Our 7 layer material means the ghost backpack is high quality, tough and long lasting.

Our 7 layer material: Be ready for even the worst of pickpocket attacks. Ghost can stop slashing of knives keeping your valuables away from harms reach. If the outer shell is compromised the inner hard shell will stop any further penetration. 
 

Ghost is also water proof and shock resistant. Looking for the best way to keep your gear safe and dry? Ghost is the answer!
 

Durability test: This shows that Ghost can carry a 50lb dumbbell with a breeze! (Bit more than your daily essentials...) Ghost is tough and will keep all your items safe and secure.
 

Material durability test: Ghost handles direct contact from a knife! But if the outer shell was compromised, the inner shell would do even better from keeping thieves out.
 


 

For maximum stability: The heaviest equipment is next to your back and centered in the pack. Medium-weight gear are carried toward the top and outside portion of the pack and lightweight gear at the bottom. This ensures that you have 20%-25% less stress on your back.

Decrease sweat stains: Ghost allows air to flow through our padding saving you from getting big sweat spots that you get with normal packs.
 

On the go charging: if you're looking for something more convenient, Ghost is your go to with its built in power and/or charging.
 

If stolen or misplaced: It's scary when your valuables are no where to be found... Luckily Ghost has you covered. With its' built in tracker, you can track the last known location effortlessly. Make your phone ring with a single touch of a button on the right sleeve in case you misplace it.
 

Simple Design: With it's minimal and sleek design, the Ghost is perfect for all genders in this style conscious and frequently on-the-go world.
 


 


 

Compact size for all your essentials: The Ghost Backpack features two primary storage areas, 3 secondary small pockets, laptop sleeve ( Fits laptops up to 15.4" ), tablet sleeve ( Fits tablets up to 12.9" ) , and quick access shoulder pockets.


Ghost Backpack: This backpack is Anti theft, tough and long lasting. Keeping your items safe and secure from any potential threat. When in use the main pocket is UNREACHABLE, thanks to our simple yet effective hidden 360 degree zipper compartment.

color choices - more to come in stretch goals!

 

How is Ghost so affordable? Given all the features and benefits the Ghost offers, how did we manage to make it so affordable? Well this can only be made possible if we reach our goal. With our mass order, we can lower our cost dramatically and skip all the retail markups, cutting out the middle man.
 


 


 

 

 


 

OUR SHIPPING POLICY

24 hours of your shipment, you will receive a tracking link. Your Ghost Backpack will be shipped from our facility in Seattle, WA. Shipments will be handled by DHL, UPS, or USPS depending on your country. International orders will be an estimated 7-21 Business days, and U.S shipments an estimated 3-5 business days.

Ghost is the answer! Durability test: This shows that Ghost can carry a 50lb dumbbell with a breeze! (Bit more than your daily essentials...) Ghost is tough and will keep all your items safe and secure. Material durability test: Ghost handles direct contact from a knife! But if the outer shell was compromised, the inner shell would do even better from keeping thieves out.  For maximum stability: The heaviest equipment is next to your back and centered in the pack. Medium-weight gear are carried toward the top and outside portion of the pack and lightweight gear at the bottom. This ensures that you have 20%-25% less stress on your back.Decrease sweat stains: Ghost allows air to flow through our padding saving you from getting big sweat spots that you get with normal packs. On the go charging: if you're looking for something more convenient, Ghost is your go to with its built in power and/or charging. If stolen or misplaced: It's scary when your valuables are no where to be found... Luckily Ghost has you covered. With its' built in tracker, you can track the last known location effortlessly. Make your phone ring with a single touch of a button on the right sleeve in case you misplace it. Simple Design: With it's minimal and sleek design, the Ghost is perfect for all genders in this style conscious and frequently on-the-go world.   Compact size for all your essentials: The Ghost Backpack features two primary storage areas, 3 secondary small pockets, laptop sleeve ( Fits laptops up to 15.4" ), tablet sleeve ( Fits tablets up to 12.9" ) , and quick access shoulder pockets.Ghost Backpack: This backpack is Anti theft, tough and long lasting. Keeping your items safe and secure from any potential threat. When in use the main pocket is UNREACHABLE, thanks to our simple yet effective hidden 360 degree zipper compartment.color choices - more to come in stretch goals! How is Ghost so affordable? Given all the features and benefits the Ghost offers, how did we manage to make it so affordable? Well this can only be made possible if we reach our goal. With our mass order, we can lower our cost dramatically and skip all the retail markups, cutting out the middle man.      OUR SHIPPING POLICY24 hours of your shipment, you will receive a tracking link. Your Ghost Backpack will be shipped from our facility in Seattle, WA. Shipments will be handled by DHL, UPS, or USPS depending on your country. International orders will be an estimated 7-21 Business days, and U.S shipments an estimated 3-5 business days.

story:
MEET INWEIGH...

WHY IS IT SO AWESOME?

KEY FEATURES & BENEFITS

INWEIGH 360 PRODUCT VIEW

   IT IS PERFECT FOR ANY AIR TRAVELER......

 

UNIQUE AND SLEEK MAKING IT A PERFECT GIFT!

IT'S MUCH MUCH MORE THAN A SCALE!

HOW INWEIGH WORKS?

1. EASY WEIGHING

INWEIGH’S patent pending design with no hooks or straps facilitates an ultimate seamless weighing experience. Simply place under the handle of your luggage & lift to view the weight on your SMART phone. Unlike other luggage scales, this unique form factor reduces stress and strain of weighing.

         

The extremely tiny form factor (70mm x 45mm x 10mm) makes it very easy and light thereby perfect for carrying anywhere you go!!!

2. BAGGAGE COMPLIANCE DATA AT YOUR FINGERTIPS

INWEIGH provides all the baggage allowance/compliance data you need for your itinerary at your fingertips. No more digging through web pages or having to read the fine prints.

 

GET QUICK ANSWERS TO TRICKY QUESTIONS!

3. EASY EMAIL INTEGRATION

INWEIGH provides easy email integration of your itinerary including auto forward that enables you to easily check the compliance for your specific itinerary.

4. LUGGAGE TRACKING AT BAGGAGE CLAIM

It saves your anxiety at baggage claim by sending you alerts when your baggage arrives, so you can relax after a long trip. Whether it is a quick stop to the restroom or feeding your baby or even catching up on your email, do your thing while we track the bag for you!

REWARDS

 

MY STORY

HOW YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS WILL HELP?

FAQs

Q1. How is the INWEIGH device powered?

INWEIGH is powered by 4 button cell batteries. Due to the Bluetooth Low energy technology used, on average these batteries can last for 2 years or more.  There is also an ON/OFF button on the device to further improve the battery conservation.

Q2. Will I need Data or Wi-Fi to track my bags at the baggage claim?

No.  INWEIGH uses Bluetooth LE technology to track your bags at baggage claim. It does not require you to have any data plan or wireless connection.

Q3. What is the range for tracking my bags?

Approximately 100-200 feet depending on interference.

story:
Having a background in Fine Arts and Design, we both decided not to give up on our dream, Architecture! In Architecture school we bumped into each other and a beautiful friendship and collaboration began! We both successfully realised our dream and now we are off to a new one: The Coloring Travel Guides!

The truth is that the economic situation in Greece is a grey one. But what is also true is that there are many young people here full of energy, passion and creativity! We would like to think of ourselves as members of this growing community. We will do our best to bring back the color to Greece but with your help and contribution we can make it even better!!


What we’ve learned from our studies in architecture is that the world around us is not about lines, shapes and forms, but it’s about the way people interpret them and the stories they build around them.

That is why we created these unusual travel guides! A coloring travel guide inspires you to color your own journey the way you want, but all the while guiding you through many beautiful places. This way, you get to be the co-author since your color palette will make each book unique!

Color Athens is the first from a series of coloring travel guides that we are planning to publish. We tried to include locations, patterns and objects that are suitable for coloring and at the same time enable you to take in the atmosphere of the city. Color Athens combines the relaxing experience of a coloring book and the wandering feeling of a travel guide.

So.. what about a blue Parthenon?! Or a yellow Caryatid?! 

It's your call and your journey!! 


Color Athens details: 96 pages paperback, dimensions: 20 X 22 X 1 cm, shipping weight 300-350 gr

 Choose from a variety of gifts we have prepared for your contributions!

  

  • If we raise 9,000 euro we can print Color Athens!

  • If we raise more than that Color Santorini, Color Mykonos, Color Crete and Color Thessaloniki are waiting in line!!

                

  • ..and even if we raise less than our goal (1,500 euro or more) Color Athens will be printed, perhaps with some small changes (less copies -enough though for your rewards!- probably we will have to leave perforated paper out and/or have it available only in english and greek).

 

This is the Indiegogo Campaign Budget! (approximate).. We have already chosen our printing house after a long research! Take a look: www.kontorousis.gr



We would really like to thank Kyr Pantelis and Takis Proios for helping us with the video production of the campaign and Nikos Psichogios for his valuable help!

  

                                                                          Visit us:

                                                           www.colourgreece.com

story:
Who We Are

Armenian National Cycling Team had great success during last 5-6 years. The momentum is still there and we are aiming for greater success.

Here are few of the success stories:

* 2011 Mher Mkrtchyan took Two Silver Medals at Wold Junior Track Cycling Championships in Moscow, Russia

* 2014 Edgar Stepanyan took Bronze Medal at  Wold Junior Track Cycling Championships in  Korea

* 2015 Edgar Stepanyan took Gold Medal at  European Junior Track Cycling Championships in Athens, Greece 

* 2015 Edgar Stepanyan took Silver Medal at  Wold Junior Track Cycling Championships in Astana, Kazakhstan

 

What We Need

In order for National Team to  compete at 2020 Tokyo Olympics in Track Cycling we need to gain points. Points are given to those who participate in World Cups and World Championships in 2017, 2018 and 2019.  

Since expenses for those events are hard to cover with very limited budget that Armenian Cycling Federation has, we ask you to help us by raising funds.

The funds would be used only to reach the goal of Tokyo 2020!

 

What You Get

The satisfaction of knowing that our National Team had fair chance of getting to the top of the sport, without being limited in their funds.

You will get a reports on all the spendings. We will keep the process as open and transparent as possible.

story:
Short Summary

Alternative Spring Break makes it possible for UVA Law students, who are willing to donate their time during Spring Break, to make an impact providing legal services all around the country. For our trip, seven UVA Law students plan to work with the Orleans Public Defenders to provide legal services to low-income people accused of crimes in Orleans Parish, Louisiana. 

The Orleans Public Defenders Office (OPD) exists to provide the citizens of Orleans Parish with the highest quality client-centered legal representation in Louisiana’s criminal and juvenile justice system. Their vision is to create a community-oriented defender office built upon the zealous defense of the poor and indigent while acknowledging the strengths of clients, families and communities.

The work being done at the OPD is crucial to ensuring a balanced justice system, where the poor have equal access to high quality representation. In the past, students have helped with a variety of cases, researching precedent, writing memos and observing trials.

Students will also be helping out in places like Bronx, NY and Washington, DC, but the trip to New Orleans will require a lot of money for travel, food and lodging. That's where you can help.

What We Need

We aim to raise $1,500 on Indiegogo. This will fund transportation and lodging for the 7 students going on this trip.

You can check out students' experiences on past trips here for more information on the program.

Thank you for considering donating to our Alternative Spring Break trip!

story:
Journey, Adventure, Mystery of Roads. Unknown… Danger… what are we looking for...? Welcome to the wild story of the non-urban life of any human being...

 The way back | This world is not easy. It can be dangerous journey through the moments of survival and perception...

Regardless of circumstances, you need to adapt to any situation...Welcome Baha. Folding Shovel Kit Pickax with Carrying Pouch Portable Tactical Army Spade Military Multitool for Outdoor Off Road Camping Hiking Backpacking Entrenching Digging Gardening Survival Vehicle Tool and much more...

 

Various jobs - one solution - Baha is the tool to cope with any task.

What makes Baha special? It is designed to handle a wide variety of uses. It can improve your outdoor enjoyment or help you survive an emergency.

An easy to use shovel, with multiple additional functions, it is a simple solution for those who are stuck in a precarious situation and supportive enough for those of you who meet any small obtsacle on the road. Survival kit is equipped with branded waterproof bag and case.

Not just a beautiful tool...Handle ccomponents are made of aviation 6063 aluminum alloy, which is used in small aircraft.

 But a way of self expression. A rigid support of your confidence. Shovel blade is made from Japanese high carbon steel 440C. This steel grade is used to make blades for very expensive knives and does not need sharpening.

The way of self-motivation. No worries, no fears… Baha assists you. A special automatic “up and down” block mechanism can control the shift mode of the shovel. It is an advanced solution, very durable, which allows you to adjust the shovel in a matter of seconds.

 

 Through the hardships. Get everything you want in woods fast and easy.

 For those difficult moments...Hammer, Axe and Hoe are included in design.

 

 When nothing is eternal.

And nobody can help you. Solve your everyday task.

 

 BAHA will be always with you. Certainly, it has a wild multipurpose knife. Thickness - 2mm. Length - 8cm. The benefits… you know

 

 No matter where you are now. Just keep it while tracking in the wild.

 A special LED CREE XP-E R2 320lm (USA) is used in the flashlight. Operational life is more than 100 thousand hours in a row. Moreover - charge your device with the integrated powerbank in the portabl mutitool shovel.

Any way of traveling… BAHA helps you to get back on the road as it is also an ideal Survival Vehicle Tool.

The Flashlight can signal SOS when the situation needs that!

The BAHA multi shovel adapts to the situation and task. BAHA shovel kit for survival is ready to become a new friend while traveling, camping, fishing, hiking and simply at home or work, in the car or riding off-road. It can be useful for urban and non-urban conditions.

 It will always be with you...Whistle and use flint in any situations u need to...

 And never let you down. Bringing needed comfort to you.

 It is your time to pledge for your success...Choose your BAHA...Freedom

 

 

  Supported by

HOW TO SURVIVE IN THIS WORLD

BAHA debuts on Kickstarter as the industry’s advanced multifunctional shovel kit for survival. It is powered with 30 functions and 21 tools. Now you don’t need to think about who can dig, saw, hack, hammer, cut, break, light in the water, fire, chop, loosen, measure, charge your devices and much more…Everything is in BAHA

KEY FEATURES

● 4 variants of shovel 23-43x6 in. (600-1085x160mm): S, M, L, ULTRA. A kit depends on the total length of the shovel and additional tools.

● A special automatic “up and down” block mechanism can control the shift mode of the shovel. It is very durable, and allows you to adjust the shovel in a matter of seconds.

● Blade of the shovel is made from high carbon steel 440C (Japan). You know how Japanese blades are valued all over the world. This steel grade is also used to make blades for very expensive knivesand holds an edge.

● Collapsible handle components are constructed of 6063 aviation-grade aluminum alloy, chosen for its high strength: weight ratio.

● The kit comes in waterproof branded bags and cases. The accessories and bags have been tested for reliability and durability, exactly what you expect from a survival kit.

● A special LED CREE XP-E R2 320lm (USA) is used in the waterproof flashlight. The light is very clean and bright. The flashlight allows you to illuminate long distances. Operational life is more than 100,000 hours.

The BAHA 6.8 lb (3.1 KG) adapts to the situation and task. BAHA shovel kit for survival is ready to become a new friend while traveling, camping, fishing, hiking and simply at home or work, in the car or riding off-road. It can be useful for urban and non-urban conditions.

Designed for versatility, the 8x6 in (200/160 mm) blade and powerful toolkit will enrich your experience and safety in extreme, wild and day-to-day situations. Baha has it all: Striking shed, Powerbank, Magnetic holder, End cap, Wheel wrench, Saw 2.8 in (7 cm), Crosshead screwdriver, Glass cullet, Wire cutters, Saw, Ruler 4 in (10 cm), Flashlight mode button, Waterproof flashlight, Whistle, Flint, Handle, Opener, Knife, Handle, Flat-head screwdriver, Handle, Ice ax, Handle, Hammer, Ax, Hoe, Hock/anchor, Shovel,

Baha is more than an awesome shovel!
