story:
How to get it!

Become a backer of this project and Pick a Reward. You will be pre-ordering the Geyser System. You'll get a special backer discount!  Want to buy more than one? Check out Rewards. 

 

 

The Geyser System is the World's Most Advanced Hot Portable Shower using only 1-gallon of water for up to 7-minutes of showering. 

The Geyser System is just 6 lbs and capable of heating your water in just 15-35 minutes*, making it perfect to take with you on your next adventure.

​Both portable and powerful, the Geyser System provides an experience unlike any other, with transportable heat, consistent water pressure, and unrivaled convenience. 

Say goodbye to the pesky barriers that keep you from enjoying the great outdoors.

 

Say Hello To

Convenient, Comfortable and Hot Showers! 

 

 

Most The Most of Every Drop: Designed with your cleaning goals in mind, the Geyser Valve gives you the capability to use the least amount of water needed to wash yourself or your gear. The result? Your water supply last you 10 times longer. 

 

 

 

How To Back

1. Choose a reward level.

Everybody can choose one (and only one) reward level to back this project. You cannot choose two reward levels. Just one. You will get all items in that reward—you cannot swap things that you don't want for things that you do want.

2. Relax, you're done for now.

All details like shipping information and color preference will be collected via survey after this campaign has ended (and yes, it is easy to change your information if needed)

 

 

 

 

ADVANCED FEATURES

 

Dependable & Durable: Explore to the ends of the earth with our device. We’ve engineered it with materials and mechanisms that will last as long as your desire for adventure.

Easy To Store: We’ve kept the heating elements and thermostats safe from fingers and fallen objects by placing a plastic gate above them. This allows you to store the sponge  in the Geyser System between showers.

Withstands Tough Elements: Each hose connector is created from non-corrosive components so that when combined with salt water the Geyser System remains as good as new.

 

 

Temperature LED Indicator: Never worry about leaving the heating element on or adding water that is too hot! Our sensors always monitor the water temperature. At 95 F (35 C), it turns the heating element off to stop drawing power. If you add water that is too hot for use, our sensor will simply shut off the pump mode until it cools. That way, no one will ever accidentally scald themselves if they forget to add cold water. 

Water-Level LED Indicator: Not only does it notify you to wrap up your wash, it also automatically shuts off the heating element when the water is low—this prevents the element from burning out and needing replacement down the line.

Lid LED Indicator: The electrically insulated heating element will only turn on when the lid is screwed on. If, for whatever reason, the heating element isn’t insulated and the lid becomes unscrewed during use, the system will cut off electricity to prevent conductive water.

 

 

Minimal upkeep and maintenance: Simply twist off the used Geyser Scrub and re-attach the new one for easy cleanup. And like all things Geyser, we’ve made it as simple as texting a friend to reorder as many as you like, so you can have dedicated sponges for your body, dishes, and gear. 

 

 

All great inventions come with great stories, and the Geyser System is no different. After spending ten years engineering and marketing advanced surgical instruments, inventor and lifelong traveler Jonathan Ballesteros decided to trade the corporate lifestyle for a 4X4 camper van and an Australian adventure. After he rigged his van and started his way across Australia, Jonathan kept discovering something interesting during his journey. While each location came with new Aussie friends and views, the complaints he heard were all the same: there was never a hot, refreshing shower.

The wheels started to turn, and then inspiration hit, one fateful day in Melbourne. He needed to prepare himself for a social outing and only had a small bottle of water left. While pouring the water bottle on a rag and attempting to wipe himself down, the initial idea for Geyser hit: “What if”, he asked himself, “the rag was a sponge with a hose connected to the water bottle?”

Just like that, the Geyser was born! Countless pumps and yards of pipe later, when he had a good prototype, Jonathan then set out to really test it in the field. He asked a team of designers and hardcore campers to take the original Geyser System out through the rugged and grueling parts of Australian Outback and come back with their feedback, ideas, and hesitations.

What was left is Geyser as it stands today, developed and tested by the brightest of minds and most passionate of explorers. 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Our suppliers are qualified and tested. Our manufacturing floor and process is secured, validated, and risks identified with a short run of 10 units. Our purchase orders secure our long-lead time electronic and mechanical components. 

Nobody likes delays, and we’re doing everything we can to deliver on an achievable and responsible schedule. That said, with a new production line, we may still have some learning curves ahead of us but our team will be here to communicate with you every step of the way.

All rewards will be shipped from the United States. Backers in certain countries may be required to pay additional taxes or may not be able to participate in this campaign. Please see below

 

FAQs

How much water does it use?

The capsule holds .8 gallons of water. One gallon of water will last up to 7-15 minutes for washing yourself or gear, depending on the flow rate you choose. Our testers found that around seven minutes is the ideal length of a refreshing shower, and that flow rate will use up to one gallon. The lowest flow rate that makes good progress with dishes/gear/etc. will last around fifteen minutes per gallon.

 

How long does it take to heat?

There are a few heating options. The primary heating option is built into the Geyser System. It takes anywhere from 15 minutes to 35 minutes* to heat up, depending on your quantity and the initial temperature of your water.

It’s important to know that the Geyser System doesn’t heat and pump at the same time (and the pump draws much less power than the heater). So, if you want, you can use a camping stove or other method to heat some water and add that to the Geyser, and it’ll be faster than using the built-in electric heater.

If you do choose to use the built-in heating element, the Geyser System comes with an SAE adaptor and two power cables to give you two options when plugging into a 12 VDC power source. The first option is using a car charger plug, and the second cable can be used to connect to a deep cycle battery.

The water heater draws 9.5 amps drawn from your 12 VDC car charger or deep cycle battery (115 watts). If you’re using the car charger, then your car must be on to heat the water, so it doesn't drain your car’s battery. If you use a small deep cycle battery from Amazon (18 amp hour, usually found for ~$40), then you can use it to heat and pump the water once.

In pump mode, you can leave the car off and use it a couple of times without worrying about car battery draining. This is good to know if you decide to bring hot water (via a thermos or similar) and mix it with cold water. The pump draws on average 2.5 amps with peaks of 3.1 amps (30 to 36 watts).

*Results will vary depending on the initial temperature and quantity of water. Our engineering bench tests show that a full Geyser System takes 35 minutes to heat the water from 63 to 95 degrees F (17 to 35 degrees C). There are two important factors here:

1. The time to heat is faster if you use less water. Our testers found that if conserving water was essential to the expedition, they could still achieve their "cleaning criteria" using only half the Geyser System's worth of water. If you do that, then it takes half the normal time (8-18 minutes) to heat.

2. The time to heat is shorter if your water is warmer when you put it in. Our testers confirmed that they find it easier to pour water into the Geyser Systems situated in the back of their vehicle instead of bringing the Geyser System to a water tap. Most of the time, water is arriving to the Geyser System at room temperature of 25 C. Our engineering bench test results show that a full Geyser System take 18 minutes to heat the water from 25 to 35 degrees C. We aim to bring that down to 15 minutes with our latest heating element that will operate at the full 120 watts.

 

Who can use a Geyser System?

We designed this system to be safe and easy enough for a child to use. Our instructions include to never add boiling water into the system. Not only do you run the risk of damaging the pump, but also run the risk of burns and scalding. Because of this, we build a safety feature that prevents the pump from working if the water is too hot (above 113 F / 45 C).

We asked our Aussie testers to be rigorous, and they were. They kept using it outside our instructions and decided to add two coffee cups of boiling water, after adding cold water. This sped up their bathing process, since it takes around five minutes to boil water. We anticipate people doing the same and adding boiling water on top of cold water, even when instructed not to.

In an effort to design for safety while being aware of the reality of how people will use the system, we have three thermostats and a water level sensor to ensure that if the water is too hot (above 45 degrees C), it will not allow you to pump. That way, you'll never accidentally burn someone, should you or someone else forget to add cold water after adding hot water. If the pump is shut off, then you'll need to add cold water and bring it back down to 85-95 F (30-35 C) before the pump will turn on again.

The way to ensure the pump is not forced off is to add cold water first and then hot water second. Our temperature indicator will tell you how hot the water is, but you should always check the water temperature by hand before using the Geyser System.

 

How do I replace a scrub?

It’s as easy as texting a friend. First, create an account on our webpage with your mobile number, contact, shipping, and billing information. Second, text the number on your skrub. Someone will immediately respond and give you what you need. We’ll also make sure the shipping address is right so that the skrubs arrive where you need them, since we know so many adventurers are constantly on the go!

 

What's the average life span of a scrub?

How much do they cost?

Scrubs are built to last. Our scrubs can be consistently used everyday for two months with no issues. Of course, the lifespan depends on how you use and store it. You can store the scrubs in the Geyser System, however, we recommend you let the scrub dry. Do not microwave or dish wash the scrub.

Individual skrubs retail for $4.50 each plus shipping. Large quantity and subscription discounts will be announced soon.

 

What's the retail cost of the Geyser System?

The retail cost of the Geyser Systems will be $295.00.

 

Can I use this for both washing dishes and showering?

Yes, you can adjust the flow rate depending on the use-case. 

 

Can I take a cold shower?

Yes, you can disable the heat element and take a cold shower. The Geyser System doesn't heat and pump at the same time, so if you want to take a cool, refreshing shower, you can do that by simply adding water and going straight to pump mode.

 

What’s the poncho for? What is it made out of?

There isn’t always a ton of privacy when you’re adventuring, so we created a Geyser change-poncho to make it easier to dry off and change your clothes without drawing attention. It’s made of a soft, synthetic microfiber (80% polyester+20% polyamide) for efficient absorption and fast drying.

Check out Rewards.   The Geyser System is the World's Most Advanced Hot Portable Shower using only 1-gallon of water for up to 7-minutes of showering. The Geyser System is just 6 lbs and capable of heating your water in just 15-35 minutes*, making it perfect to take with you on your next adventure.​Both portable and powerful, the Geyser System provides an experience unlike any other, with transportable heat, consistent water pressure, and unrivaled convenience. Say goodbye to the pesky barriers that keep you from enjoying the great outdoors. Say Hello To Convenient, Comfortable and Hot Showers!   Most The Most of Every Drop: Designed with your cleaning goals in mind, the Geyser Valve gives you the capability to use the least amount of water needed to wash yourself or your gear. The result? Your water supply last you 10 times longer.    How To Back1. Choose a reward level.Everybody can choose one (and only one) reward level to back this project. You cannot choose two reward levels. Just one. You will get all items in that reward—you cannot swap things that you don't want for things that you do want.2. Relax, you're done for now.All details like shipping information and color preference will be collected via survey after this campaign has ended (and yes, it is easy to change your information if needed)    ADVANCED FEATURES Dependable & Durable: Explore to the ends of the earth with our device. We’ve engineered it with materials and mechanisms that will last as long as your desire for adventure.Easy To Store: We’ve kept the heating elements and thermostats safe from fingers and fallen objects by placing a plastic gate above them. Our sensors always monitor the water temperature. At 95 F (35 C), it turns the heating element off to stop drawing power. If you add water that is too hot for use, our sensor will simply shut off the pump mode until it cools. That way, no one will ever accidentally scald themselves if they forget to add cold water. Water-Level LED Indicator: Not only does it notify you to wrap up your wash, it also automatically shuts off the heating element when the water is low—this prevents the element from burning out and needing replacement down the line.Lid LED Indicator: The electrically insulated heating element will only turn on when the lid is screwed on. story:
Hidden Value in Vacant and Abandoned Buildings

I began developing the pilot project version of the Hidden Value in Abandoned Buildings (HViAB) platform withDan Fehrenbach, a programmer with Elevate Energy (formerly CNT Energy) -- a division of the Center for Neighborhood Technology in Chicago. It's a map based browser tool that shows available amenities and resources such as transit stations, schools, grocery stores and banks located within a half mile radius of an abandoned or vacant property.

A very rudimentary version of the tool won runner up at the Urban Sustainability Hackathon sponsored by CNT in October 2012.  Further efforts will be devoted to developing a more complete and robust database for Bronzeville.  I plan to accomplish this goal through my own research, along with seeking the cooperation of organizations and agencies already engaged in housing related issues, as well as gaining the cooperation of stakeholders in the neighborhoods where vacant and abandoned properties are located.

HViAB and Legally Occupy

This funding campaign is designed to serve as a launching pad for a larger ongoing initiative. As a result, I set my funding goal for $500, the minimum figure set by IndieGoGo. My work on developing the HViAB platform would focus on developing a sense of what amenities and resources are  available, what gaps remain, and how to bridge the gaps in successfully developing available vacant and abandoned properties.  My ultimate goal is to develop an initiative I have named Legally Occupy, which will serve as a clearinghouse to match financial resources and abandoned and vacant properties, with individuals, households and organizations seeking to develop and/or obtain affordable housing.  With an initial focus here in Chicago, the long-term goal is to replicate the HViAB platform and the Legally Occupy model nationwide. 

Why Bronzeville?

As a historically and culturally significant area of Chicago,  Bronzeville is an ideal focus for the prototype of the HViAB tool.  The Great Migration that brought many black sharecroppers from the South to the North began in 1916, and community and cultural organizations throughout Bronzeville are actively engaged in several projects designed to celebrate the upcoming centennial. The Black Metropolis National Heritage Area Commission is spearheading one of the most exciting initiatives, actively promoting the region as a cultural tourist destination for domestic and international travelers.

Specifically Bronzeville features:

  • An abundance of vacant and abandoned structures
  • Location close to the lakefront and downtown
  • Excellent public transportation options
  • A multitude of cultural and other desirable amenities
  • Active community involvement

Who I Am

I am a professional writer and researcher who holds advanced degrees in sociology and law from Northwestern University. I am also a longtime Chicago area resident with extensive knowledge of Chicago's housing related issues. For instance, from 2004 to 2007, I analyzed extensive public housing demographic data concerning the Chicago Housing Authority Plan for Transformation, and contributed to writing annual reports submitted to the CHA.

I became involved with sustainability in general and affordable housing in particular in 2006, when I attended World Urban Forum 3 in Vancouver, Canada. Since then, I have been an invited speaker at the Chicago Green Festival in 2009, 2011 and 2012. In 2007, I launched the group Sustainable Urban Development, which now boasts nearly 10,000 members on LinkedIn. I was also invited to present the HViAB platform by the Chicago Center for Green Technology as part of its Green Tech U program for the Summer 2014 term.  I write about sustainability in the built environment as a guest blogger for Sustainable Cities Collective, and in my own blog, Sustainable Urban Future.

The Impact

The reason I first proposed a presentation for the 2012 Chicago Green Festival on converting abandoned buildings into affordable housing was because I thought it was ridiculous that perfectly habitable buildings were standing empty while people were facing homelessness.  I still feel this way.  It's also all too apparent that although the economy has slowly begun to improve, affordable housing is an ongoing challenge. My ultimate hope is the HViAB tool and Legally Occupy will not only match residents who need housing with residences converted from vacant and abandoned buildings, but that this initiative will ultimately become a resource to promote sustainable development in Chicago and across the country.

PLEASE CONTRIBUTE BY PAYPAL IF POSSIBLE.

Funds contributed by PayPal are distributed immediately and will be put right to work in developing the fully functional demonstration HViAB tool.  Funds contributed by credit card are held until the end of the campaign (August 2014).

Specifically, funds raised toward this initial phase will:

  • Finance GIS training through the Chicago Metropolitan Agency for Planning (CMAP) -- $300
  • Finance production of t-shirt and e-book to be rewarded to donors -- varies according to amount raised.
  • Cover IndieGoGo processing fees -- varies according to amount raised.

Donations in excess of above listed expenses will allow me to devote specifically allotted time to the HViAB project. As an independent consultant, I am only paid for "billable" time.  As a result, the time I have been able to devote to this project so far has been severely limited.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please "like" the Legally Occupy andKnowledge Empowerment pages on Facebook to help spread the word!  If you're not on Facebook, email or plain old word of mouth will do just fine! 

Please also feel free to contact me through this campaign to share resources that you know of in and around Chicago concerning affordable housing, or to ask questions about the HViAB tool.

story:
With 35 liters of water-tight storage and a suite of complimentary modular accessories that can seamlessly adapt to accommodate the demands of work, travel and the outdoors, it is the most versatile waterproof backpack, ever. 

Brought to you by Tillak - a Certified B Corporation® with a mission to develop innovative and affordable outdoor products, minimize our impact, and to give back to the environment and the outdoor community.

 

Taking full advantage of the Siletz' 35 Liters of water-tight storage is its incredibly versatile suite of complimentary modular accessories. The full range of accessories are organized into two separate, integrated accessory systems that we painstakingly designed to help you seamlessly transition between the various aspects of your life. The components of each system are designed to slide effortlessly into the Siletz and work in unison. 

 

 

We spend a significant amount of time identifying the best materials and hardware for use in our products, as well as vetting our manufacturers for their attention to detail and their quality of craftsmanship. As a result, we stand entirely behind our product and provide a Limited Lifetime Warranty against manufacturer’s defects or damages incurred while shipping. So rest assured knowing that your Tillak gear will get to you safely and was designed and built for the long haul.

 

The Siletz River is home to an array of unique plant and animal species, including Spotted Owl, Marbled Murrelet, Giant Pacific Salamander, and the Valley of the Giants - an exceptional old growth forest with some of the fastest growing conifers in Oregon. Native fish species that call the watershed home include Coastal Cutthroat trout, Coho salmon, Fall and Spring Chinook Salmon, Chum salmon, Summer and Winter Steelhead, and resident Rainbow Trout. Unfortunately, this Watershed has also been deemed the most deforested watershed in Oregon and has the largest density of roads in the state, largely as a result of poor private timber practices.

Once all of our backers’ orders have been manufactured, shipped, and delivered, we will allocate 25% of the remaining profits toward the Native Fish Society’s Landslides to Logjams Campaign; their ongoing effort to halt irresponsible timber harvesting practices and the watershed destruction that occurs as a result. 

Learn more about our Goods That Give Back™ program.

Want to feature the Siletz Modular Carry System? Feel free to download our Press Kit.

 

Risks and challenges

We have been working to design, produce, and sell our current product line with our suppliers and manufacturers for some time now, which has allowed us to develop an increasingly efficient and effective method of working with them to bring new ideas from the design table to your doorstep. While this is our first time here on Kickstarter, it is far from our first time bringing a new product to market.

While we have worked tirelessly for some time to ensure that this product is market ready, and have built an amazing team of tried and true manufacturing partners, we understand that some issues and events are entirely unavoidable and can lead to problems or delays. As our backer, we assure you if such is the case, that you will be notified immediately and that we will remain transparent as we work to address and solve the issue. 

As a company we have always taken great pride in our customer service, and we promise to take the same approach to this campaign; answering questions, responding to feedback, and providing updates to our backers as quickly and as often as we can.
story_txt:
With 35 liters of water-tight storage and a suite of complimentary modular accessories that can seamlessly adapt to accommodate the demands of work, travel and the outdoors, it is the most versatile waterproof backpack, ever. 
Brought to you by Tillak - a Certified B Corporation® with a mission to develop innovative and affordable outdoor products, minimize our impact, and to give back to the environment and the outdoor community.




















 










Taking full advantage of the Siletz' 35 Liters of water-tight storage is its incredibly versatile suite of complimentary modular accessories. The full range of accessories are organized into two separate, integrated accessory systems that we painstakingly designed to help you seamlessly transition between the various aspects of your life. The components of each system are designed to slide effortlessly into the Siletz and work in unison. 









 


 

We spend a significant amount of time identifying the best materials and hardware for use in our products, as well as vetting our manufacturers for their attention to detail and their quality of craftsmanship. As a result, we stand entirely behind our product and provide a Limited Lifetime Warranty against manufacturer’s defects or damages incurred while shipping. So rest assured knowing that your Tillak gear will get to you safely and was designed and built for the long haul.




 
The Siletz River is home to an array of unique plant and animal species, including Spotted Owl, Marbled Murrelet, Giant Pacific Salamander, and the Valley of the Giants - an exceptional old growth forest with some of the fastest growing conifers in Oregon. Native fish species that call the watershed home include Coastal Cutthroat trout, Coho salmon, Fall and Spring Chinook Salmon, Chum salmon, Summer and Winter Steelhead, and resident Rainbow Trout. Unfortunately, this Watershed has also been deemed the most deforested watershed in Oregon and has the largest density of roads in the state, largely as a result of poor private timber practices.

Once all of our backers’ orders have been manufactured, shipped, and delivered, we will allocate 25% of the remaining profits toward the Native Fish Society’s Landslides to Logjams Campaign; their ongoing effort to halt irresponsible timber harvesting practices and the watershed destruction that occurs as a result. 

Learn more about our Goods That Give Back™ program.

Want to feature the Siletz Modular Carry System? Feel free to download our Press Kit.
 
Risks and challenges
We have been working to design, produce, and sell our current product line with our suppliers and manufacturers for some time now, which has allowed us to develop an increasingly efficient and effective method of working with them to bring new ideas from the design table to your doorstep. While this is our first time here on Kickstarter, it is far from our first time bringing a new product to market.
While we have worked tirelessly for some time to ensure that this product is market ready, and have built an amazing team of tried and true manufacturing partners, we understand that some issues and events are entirely unavoidable and can lead to problems or delays. As our backer, we assure you if such is the case, that you will be notified immediately and that we will remain transparent as we work to address and solve the issue. 
As a company we have always taken great pride in our customer service, and we promise to take the same approach to this campaign; answering questions, responding to feedback, and providing updates to our backers as quickly and as often as we can.

story:
GO SLING PRO: AN ANTI-THEFT BAG FOR THE MODERN TRAVELER 

 

We all love to travel. Just being in a new place can exude in us a sense of freedom. When we're travelling or exploring, many of us like to capture those epic moments with our cameras. But camera gear isn't cheap and most camera bags are not equipped to protect your precious gear from prying eyes. The solution? A stylish, compact travel bag equipped with anti-theft features. A bag that makes you feel at ease when taking the crowded metro in Paris or New York.

 

A BAG DESIGNED FOR TRAVEL

Introducing Go Sling Pro: A compact travel bag that can easily be converted to a camera bag and viceversa. It's designed to safely carry your DSLR and lens...and then some. We've revamped an old favourite, to make it even more relevant to today's lifestyle. It comes with slash resistant Kevlar that is 5 times stronger than steel, lockable zippers, which allow you to lock the bag for extra security against pickpockets, cutproof strap and an external USB port so you never run out of battery again. Aesthetically designed and extremely functional.  

 

STRETCH GOALS

 

WHAT MAKES GO SLING PRO SO SPECIAL?

Perfect for your around town photo ops or photo worthy getaway. The Go Sling Pro's magnetic strap buckle allows you to effortlessly remove the bag. Quick access main compartment allows access for you to get to your camera quickly, and its modular construction allows you to fit a range of gear. You'll be amazed at this bag's versatility.

 

Anti-Theft Features

Travellers can be easy targets for pickpockets. Travellers with flashy camera bags are even greater targets for pickpockets. The Go Sling Pro comes with integrated anti-theft features to make it theft proof.

  • Concealed Zippers
  • Lockable Zippers
  • Slashproof Kevlar mid-layer
  • Slashproof Strap

 

Waterproof Materials

 

 

USB External Port

 

Magnetic Strap Buckle

The secure Magnetic Buckle makes taking the bag off a breeze.

 

Internal Modular System

 

 

DEEP DIVE INTO THE DETAILS

PERKS AND PRICING

Our company exists because of you: our backers. We want to thank you by giving you access to our new products first, at a heavily discounted price. We are offering you all of our crowdfunding products, including the Go Sling Pro at wholesale price. We're producing these bags ourselves and selling exclusively online. This means there are no middlemen or retailers taking a profit from this sale. This way, the savings are directly transferred to you.

 

 

SHARE THE LOVE

Know someone who will love this project?

Let them know about it by clicking on the buttons below:

If you're interested in writing about this project, you can find everything you need in our Press Kit

 

WE ARE ALPAKA

Our gear is built for the city but is tough enough to thrive in the outdoors. We're crowdfunded and damn proud of it. We exist because of you and with your support, we'll be able to continue to bring you awesome gear to help with your everyday adventures.

We've delivered thousands of products around the world and we love nothing more than when our backers share how they use our products in their daily lives. This is what drives us. 

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

This is our fourth crowdfunding campaign, and we know what it takes to run a successful one. The real challenge starts after the campaign ends and the funds are released. We know that with our experience we will be able to produce the bag and have it shipped to backers by March – 2019. We have the full support of the manufacturer and all parties involved are set and ready to go.

The funds raised are going directly into the production/manufacturing of the bag. Even though we do not see any direct risks, there are always unforeseen circumstances that may present themselves during production and fulfillment. If this were to occur, we will always be 100% transparent with you and communicate this to you right away. Our goal is to get you an awesome, high-quality bag you are excited about, and we will do everything we possibly can to make that happen.

FAQs

Frequently Asked Questions

Is there a power bank included in the sling?

No, the sling will be delivered without the power bank.

There is a simple connection inside the sling that makes sure that you can easily connect all power banks that are on the market (by USB plug).

This way the power bank will never be outdated and you can keep using new models to charge your devices. This bag is designed to last!

Is the lock included in the sling?

No, the lock can be added as an add-on. Hint: Scroll up for instructions on how to back the campaign.

What are the shipping costs?
Shipping varies from country to country. There is just a small surcharge applied at checkout. Simply click on the pledge and select your delivery country, you will automatically see what the shipment costs are for your selected country.

What is the content of the sling?

The Go Sling Pro will hold up to 5L at full capacity.

What is the weight of the sling?

The weight of the sling empty (with the strap) is 650 grams.

Is the sling 100% waterproof?

The sling is triple-coated with a water repellent spray, but it is not waterproof.

This means that in normal rain conditions, you should be safe and all your items will stay dry. However, the bag is not intended to protect your valuables when thrown in a pool, body of water or to be in a full rain pour for about an hour.

Is the sling washing machine proof?

The sling is not washing machine proof. However, since the whole bag is covered with a water-repellent coating, the sling is already better protected against dirt and stains attaching to the fabric.
Furthermore, it is easily washable with a wet cloth or wipes.

What payment methods do you accept?

For this project, we can only accept payment by Credit Card, no other payments methods.
If there is a problem with the payment with your CC, please contact the customer support team of Indiegogo, as they are in charge of collecting the payments.

Can I pay extra to get an earlier delivery?

This is unfortunately not possible. It is not a matter of extra costs, but a matter of making sure that we ship out all the bags in the most efficient way as possible. However, there will be 200 sling bags available for early delivery if you pledge for the Early Delivery reward.

Unfortunately, we cannot make exceptions to this process as it will delay all the other shipments.

Will I have to pay duties/VAT to receive my order?

We will do all we possibly can to prevent this from happening, but any applicable duties/VAT are the sole responsibility of the backer.

We have absolutely no control over the additional duties/VAT that may or may not be charged in your country. If you are unsure whether or not you will be charged duties/VAT at the time of receiving your perk, please get in touch with your local post office.

The bags will be shipped from Hong Kong, this will help you to calculate the costs.

Can I get a refund if I change my mind?

For live campaigns, you can cancel at any time. Once the campaign moves into InDemand, you have 11 days after you pledge to cancel.

Where can I fill in my delivery address?

At the end of the project, we will send out a survey to all our backers. In this survey, we will collect all the needed data such as your delivery address.
We will also send out an email to all backers right before we will send out all the packages to make sure this delivery address is still up to date.

Will we receive a tracking number for our shipment?

All backers will receive a personal tracking number with which they can trace their shipment.

Can I pick up my delivery?

This is unfortunately not possible. Our entire delivery process is automated to create as much efficiency as possible. This is in order to make sure that all backers will receive their package on time. A manual pick-up will disrupt this process and is therefore not possible.

story:
The Forest Folk Magazine

The idea to start the magazine was born about six months ago, sometime in September 2016.. 

Some of you might know me as @theforestkind on Instagram - and, you guessed it: I just love the forest, trees, plants and nature. I've been passionate about outdoor living and activities (especially with kids) for a long time and having a wild child just encouraged this passion even more..

But not only do I love outdoor activities+nature, I also love learning about the plants, trees, weeds etc I find there. What to do with them, how to use them and what they are good for.

The possibilities to learn, make, create and experience in the forest are endless!

Combining outdoor living with slow living, herbalism, bushcraft, art, care and many more with each other is the aim of the Forest Folk Magazine. 

As the idea of the Magazine became clearer and clearer, I began looking for suitable contributors and experts in these fields (well knowing I could never do it all myself), but little did I know that I will find the most amazing team to help me forming my ideas into an actual magazine! 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Yeah, like always, in the end it all comes down to money..

Ideally and realistically we will need to fund the first two issues to be on the safe side and  to ensure  the magazines future..

By buying your copy and choosing the perks that you like most, you will not only help us making the dream of the magazine come true and ensure its future, you will also be rewarded the best value for your money+exclusive perks that no one after the campaign will be able to get.

 

 

Uh.. And did you know you're helping the environment too?

We will not only print on recycled paper with non-toxic inks, but we will also plant a tree for every issue sold! (Locally and native trees, so be prepared to see us getting our hands dirty!)

 

Can't contribute right now? 

Don't worry!! We understand.. But you could still help us by sharing our campaign, telling your friends about it and joining our journey on social media!

story:
Look Up...Have you "Liked" and "Tweeted" us yet?

www.bravestskydiving.org

Photo Appearing in September 2012 issue of Parachutist Magazine

Who we are

We are New York City Firefighters' Bravest Skydiving Club (Bravest Skydiving Club, Inc).  We are a non-profit organization that exists to promote the sport of skydiving within the ranks of the FDNY by making the sport affordable, safe, and fun while sharing the thrills that can only be found by jumping out of perfectly good airplanes. We are committed to the safety of our members, raising money for charitable organizations, and following the guidance of the United States Parachute Association.

The Fire Department of the City of New York (FDNY) is the largest municipal fire department in the United States, and the second largest department in the world.  The FDNY has many fraternal and sport organizations, but none quite like our Skydiving Club.

Club Founder and America's Next Top Model Winner CariDee English After a Jump in 2012

Our Club's Goal

  1. Build, train, and maintain a club of skydivers comparable to the US Army Golden Knights and Georgia Tech Skydiving teams.  
  2. Honor the legacy of the New York City Fire Deparment by representing the Department on the national and international skydiving curcuit.
  3. Raise money for FDNY families with sick or injured children in need of financial assistance (For more information please visit http://www.bravestskydiving.org/jump-4.html)

 

Why we need your help

Skydiving is a very expensive.  Training and equipment costs prevent many of our club members from acheiving their full potential.

Our membership needs the safest and most modern equipment and instruction currently avaiable.  Your contributions ensure our members get the very best.

OUR members keep the citizens and visitors of New York City safe and YOUR contributions are used to help keep our members safe.  We will graciously apply your contributions towards building our club's equipement locker, providing state of the art training opportunities for our members, and ensuring our club's presence on the national and international skydiving curcuit.

What your contribution will get you

$3: A club sticker to show your support!

$15: One Club T-shirt, club sticker, and one Jump Certificate good for a discounted tandem jump at one of four New York City area dropzones.

$25: 2 Club Supporter T-shirts, 2 club stickers, 2 jump certificates.

$40 (Best Value!): 4 Club Supporter T-shirts, 4 club stickers, 4 jump certificates.

$400: Honorary Membership- A tandem jump at the dropzone of your choice (in the United States or Canada) plus two Club Supporter T-shirts and stickers, a framed certificate of honorary membership in the club, and an honorable mention on our website.

$500: Official Sponsorship- Contributions of $1000 or more will be graciously accepted and you and/or your organization will become listed as an official sponsor of the club- entitling your organization to use our club's likeness for your promotional purposes.

$1000: Corporate Sponsorship- Contributions of $5000 or more will be graciously accepted from corporations/companies looking for more specific sponsorship requirements.

PLEASE INCLUDE THE SIZE OF T-SHIRT(S) YOU WOULD LIKE AFTER MAKING YOUR CONTRIBUTION! 

 

The Impact

Your contribution will help the Bravest Skydiving Club one day become as well known and respected as the U.S. Army Golden Knights.

Perhaps you'll see us jumping into Yankee Stadium one day, and you can say- "Hey, I helped them do that"!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Donate to our charity: Jump 4...  Donations are accepted via our website (www.bravestskydiving.org).  100% of your donation will be added to our emergency fund for FDNY families with sick or injured children in need of financial assistance.
  • Get out and make a jump.  Spread the word how wonderful our sport is!
  • Be sure to use Indiegogo share tools!

 

BLUE SKIES!!!!

STICKER INCLUDED WITH EVERY CONTRIBUTION OF $5.00 or MORE!

story:
Let's create a movement of global impact through sustainable travel

 

Among 1,5 Billion passionate world-explorers, we are anticipating the re-launch of tourism post COVID-19. Until 2030 another 300 Million will join us in the global travel movement (1,2 for sources please refer to the bottom of this page).

According to the United Nations tourism has the potential to supercharge our collective effort in overcoming mankind’s biggest challenges by moving towards achieving the Sustainable Development Goals (3).

Getting an idea about the positive impact you are creating is almost impossible because of the complexity and dependencies of the global village we all are living in. Despite positive ambitions it might even lead to a negative impact overall, not to mention the additional impact of all other travelers.

That’s why we are developing Triplist by Ximalia – the app that makes sustainable travel simple and accessible for everyone. Get the most positively impactful sustainable travel packages based on your preferences.

All perks feature the following benefits:

  • Lifelong early access to the Triplist app and all version updates
  • Membership in our Early Adopter Camp
  • Honorable mention on our website
  • Special “early day supporter” medal in our community

 

Triplist App

Travel sustainably through a combination of high tech, eco certifications, carbon offset and social action (e.g. donations or micro-credits).

  • Sustainable travel packages based on:
    • Our global sustainability index
    • Carbon offsetting
    • Certified sustainable Hotels
    • Social actions
  • Get sustainable travel packages based on your wishes and no-gos
  • Rate packages and keep your favorite ones in your Triplist
  • Share your Triplist with friends and family
  • Book seamlessly inside the app

Check out our app mockup slides at the top of the page to get an idea of how it will look.

 

Our Story

Ximalia’s story started in late 2018 as our idea emerged as a winner at the global startup weekend Paris. My co-founder Thomas and I (Alexandre, CEO) are determined to forge positive change in the world by combining our skillsets. Inspired by the Sustainable Development Goals, we developed the vision to make tourism sustainable. In the following two years we worked closely together with the Palawan Council for Sustainable Developments, Philippines and the city of Ghent, Belgium to build our prototype on incremental feedback. As a result, a global sustainability index (beta-version) is born. The positive feedback led us to build an API for businesses and create a concrete plan for our main product: Triplist by Ximalia – the app that makes sustainable travel simple and accessible for everyone.

 

Team

Our international team comprises of five people with backgrounds in Finance, Mathematics, Business and Data Science. Currently we are incubated at Welcome City Lab Paris, a tourism specific incubator where we are in touch with industry experts.

 

Goal

To increase the speed of development we created this roadmap:

Version 1:

We will be able to develop the features described above under “Triplist App” within 6 months. This can be achieved with 67k€.

Version 2:

Additionally, we will provide the functionality for you to follow signature Triplists created by us and our partners (e.g. sustainable travel influencers). This can be developed within 2 months after the release of the first version with a total amount of 84k€ (V1 + V2).

Version 3:

Triplist sharing becomes interactive: Common set of prefrences, voting of recommendations and a chat functionality to discuss your next holiday with friends. Within an additional 2 months for a total of 101k€ (V1 + V2 + V3).

Version 4+ - outlook beyond 101K€:

Our long-term vision is to connect all communities that revolve around tourism and connect people that otherwise didn’t stand a chance at knowing each other. Therefore, we have planned various features that will be implemented depending on the amount raised. For example:

  • Marketplace for small local business owners that lack other resources to connect with impact travelers
  • Connect regional social and cultural initiatives with impact travelers
  • Connect impact travelers with initiatives to uphold cultural heritage
  • Connect environmental activists with impact travelers
  • Connect impact travelers with local guides
  • Connecting impact travelers with each other pre, during and post trip

 

Risks & Challenges

Developing such a complex technical product requires time, rigorous planning, and expertise. A major risk is to plan poorly and consequently fail to deliver in time or, even worse, not to deliver at all!

Therefore, we took as much time as we needed to create a detailed plan for all features we might want to offer in the next five years and broke it down to the technical functionality we need to figure out the amount of money necessary for our first version of the app.

Thomas, our CTO is a Mathematician and has 20years+ of industry expertise in IT, Big Data and Artificial Intelligence running big international data center projects and building his own Data Science company from scratch. In the face of challenges, he is the right person to lead the technological part of a project like ours and guarantee success.

Alexandre, our CEO is the right person to ensure that we are on track as a business. As a financial analyst he has challenged many companies and their respective executives. Thereby he gained the experience to detect strategic flaws and financial risks in businesses.  

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you find yourself unable to contribute financially during these challenging times: don’t worry, you can still help us on our mission!

  • Spread the news and share our campaign on your social media.
  • Let us know anyone who is interested in our project.

Thank you so much and hopefully see you soon in our Early Adopter Camp! 

All the best,

The Ximalia team

Sources:

1 https://bit.ly/2NqWZv7

2 https://bit.ly/2Y1rj1h

3 https://bit.ly/3sLcZIm
story_txt:
Let's create a movement of global impact through sustainable travel Among 1,5 Billion passionate world-explorers, we are anticipating the re-launch of tourism post COVID-19. Until 2030 another 300 Million will join us in the global travel movement (1,2 for sources please refer to the bottom of this page).According to the United Nations tourism has the potential to supercharge our collective effort in overcoming mankind’s biggest challenges by moving towards achieving the Sustainable Development Goals (3).Getting an idea about the positive impact you are creating is almost impossible because of the complexity and dependencies of the global village we all are living in. Despite positive ambitions it might even lead to a negative impact overall, not to mention the additional impact of all other travelers.That’s why we are developing Triplist by Ximalia – the app that makes sustainable travel simple and accessible for everyone. Get the most positively impactful sustainable travel packages based on your preferences.All perks feature the following benefits:
Lifelong early access to the Triplist app and all version updates
Membership in our Early Adopter Camp
Honorable mention on our website
Special “early day supporter” medal in our community
 Triplist AppTravel sustainably through a combination of high tech, eco certifications, carbon offset and social action (e.g. donations or micro-credits).
Sustainable travel packages based on:
Our global sustainability index
Carbon offsetting
Certified sustainable Hotels
Social actions


Get sustainable travel packages based on your wishes and no-gos
Rate packages and keep your favorite ones in your Triplist
Share your Triplist with friends and family
Book seamlessly inside the app

story:
Each year, we make the pilgrimage to the wasteland of Black Rock City Nevada to provide weary travelers with frosty cold libations. 
   The coldest beers, chillest margaritas (frozen & on the rocks), our Skittles moonshine and the only bar to provide a unique alcohol experience with vaporized shots you smoke/inhale. 
    We provide this experience in a post-apocalyptic one of a kind bar called the Soul Paradise Western Delirium Desert Bar. It's Tank girl meets Coyote Ugly for those souls who dare venture into our establishment.  
    Experience the Wheel of Misfortune where every spin is a prize or a punishment.   

Our gift comes at a great expense and we need your help to bring in back. For the price of a few drinks at your local bar, you can help us bring the magic back for 2018.  

With each donation, half will go to our charitable organization, LOVE146. Love146 is an international human rights organization working to end child trafficking and exploitation through survivor care and prevention. The trafficking and exploitation of children is one of the darkest stories and most severe human rights abuses imaginable. But for us, the hope of ending it is a reality. Love146 is helping grow the movement to end child trafficking while providing effective, thoughtful solutions. We believe in the power of love and its ability to effect sustainable change. Love is the foundation of our motivation.

PLEASE DONATE TODAY!

story:
The Most Convenient Multi-functional Car Washing Kit

Norshire combines 5 useful functions in one single portable device, including car washing kit, jump starter, warning sign and power bank. It makes your life easier, especially in emergencies, and saves you more than $500/year.

Norshire Is Featured On 


Norshire is a pressure car washer you would love to have on the back of your car.
Check out what Megan and Padre think about Norshire on TWiT.tv.

 

Car Washing Kit

With Norshire, car washing has never been easier. Norshire returns your car back to its clean and shiny state in no time. All you need is Norshire and a bottle or bucket of water. No hassle needed in finding a faucet or an electricity plug.

Its built-in rechargeable battery can be fully charged within 3 hours and wash your car for a whole hour.

 

Norshire Car Wash Performance


Jump Starter

Everyone needs a plan B, and so does your car. Norshire is a powerful jump starter for your car whenever you’re on the road and wherever you are. A dead battery will no longer bother your travels once you have Norshire.

Norshire has a built-in rechargeable lithium battery to serve as a powerful jump starter and requires no external power to function. You can easily fully charge it within 3 hours using any USB charging port.

 

3 Steps to Jump Start Your Car

 

The max current is 400A. The capacity is 11000mAh.

 

Norshire supports most car types in the market and can jump start a car up to 30 times when fully charged.

*It might not be able to jump start some 4-wheel drive vehicles. 

 

Warning Sign

Norshire can become an emergency warning sign when you are facing an unexpected incident.

 

Power Bank

Norshire can be your power bank. It’s able to charge your phone up to 4 times. So you don’t need to worry about your phone running out of battery any more.

Norshire is also the perfect power source for camping and picnicking. It offers power for speakers, fans, phones, lamps and laptops.

 

Tire Inflator & Touch Screen

Norshire X2S also sports a tire inflating function and a beautiful LED touch screen, in addition to all those features in X1S.

 

To Sum up, It Saves You More Than $500/year.

Let’s do a quick math.

If you can save $500/year without sacrificing quality of life, why not?  

 

It’s Incredibly Convenient.

Compact yet powerful

Norshire combines 4 useful functions into one single portable device, including a car washing kit, jump starter, warning sign, and power bank.

Norshire has powerful functions but still remains so compact in size that it can fit easily in any car trunk for everyday use.

 

No need to worry about water or power sources

The water source could be directly from a water bottle or external sources such as our foldable water bucket. It saves you time trying to find a faucet. Just use a water bottle, put it into the water inlet, and connect it with Norshire. The cleaning process is neat and easy, without any mess. Norshire makes car washing easy, fast, and free of charge.

The built-in lithium battery supports car washing for an hour when fully charged via any USB port. No need to look for a power plug anymore when you need to wash a car.

Easy to set up

Norshire makes car washing easier and faster than ever before. It takes only 15 seconds to set up and 10 minutes to complete the wash, 80% less than the time required for traditional car washes. It’s a dream partner for every car owner.

Multi-mode of washing

Norshire has three preset modes for various scenarios - you can easily switch from spray gun to spray brush to high pressure mode for different kinds of cleaning.


Additional Benefits

 

House Cleaning & Gardening

In addition to car washing, Norshire is also useful in gardening and house cleaning, i.e. flower watering and window cleaning.

Voice Reminder

Norshire has a voice indicator that can alert you the battery status and whether or not it’s charging.

 

Product Details

Made of ABS material, Norshire has resistance to shock and high temperature. Enjoy a premium look as well with black frosted spray paint. With its sealing structure, it can also effectively avoid leaks.

Norshire consists of a built-in 11000mAh lithium battery, high pressure pump made with pure copper, and micro CPU. The CPU can intelligently control the power system and high pressure pump, which ensures a high pressure and stable water flow. 

 

Product Specs

Weight & Dimension

 

Perks:

 

 

We're Shipping

 

Timeline

 

About Us 

Dear Backers,

I’m Frank, co-founder of Norshire. I originally thought about the idea of Norshire around two years ago when I was living in Australia. I love road trips. I have been in many situations on the road such as dead battery in the middle of nowhere, or no water source or electric plug for washing my car. I was trying to find a product on the market which was small enough yet powerful with multiple functionalities. But I couldn’t find a perfect one. One day, my friend Anthony told me “It’s a fantastic idea! Why don’t you create a new product?” Here I am since then.

Norshire now is a team of 20 talented engineers, designers and marketers. We spent the past 1.5 years creating, designing and developing this product to provide every customer the best experience.

Thanks for your great support! I hope Norshire can become your perfect travel kit!

Frank

story:
A Little About Me

My name is Matthew and I live in Jelenia Góra, which is a beautiful city located within the Lower Silesian Voivodeship, close to the Kakonosze mountain range running along the Polish-Czech border.

I love my city and my country.  When people around the world hear of Poland, it is usually in the context of WWII.  That was a long time ago and Poland is now a beautiful country.

I want you to see Poland the way I do, with all its splendor, amazing people, delicious food and incredible history.

With your contributions, you will help me achieve my dreams of becoming a Vlogger, riding around this amazing country and showing the world what it has to offer.

What We Need & What You Get

The best way to Vlog about Poland is traveling the country by motorcycle.  Your contributions will go towards the purchase of a new motorcycle, which will be used to tour the country.  Throughout my travels I plan to bring you videos and photos (including some of my funny blooper clips) of hidden gems within Poland, and of course great places to eat and drink :)

If I don't reach my entire goal, the funds will go into an investment and saved until I am able to put a down-payment on a new bike.

The Impact

Poland has typically been know for its involvement during WWII.  Poland has grown a lot since then and we are known for much more today then what the history books say.  Their are great places to visit around the world , but once I show you Poland, you will want to visit here instead ;)

Risks & Challenges

Is this campaign without risk, of course not.  What campaign has no risk?  My Vlog is a one-man-show.  I ride, I take the videos and photos, I bring you Poland.  I am the man behind the camera, in front of the camera and behind the computer, but I am also a new father and that in itself, is the greatest challenge. My dream is not just for me, it's also for my family.  I want to provide them with the best future I can.  Some days I may be unable to ride, but I can always Vlog.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that not everyone can contribute funds to my campaign, but you can still help by spreading the word.  Share my campaign on your favorite motorcycle forums, Facebook pages or tourist sites, with your friends, family and co-workers.  Anything you can do to help me achieve my dream will be greatly appreciated.

story:
The waiting is Over

                 Meet the drone can be controlled with Hands-free     

                                                 

Activate a drone with brain electrical impulses is NO longer science fiction!  Now with UDrone, all you need to do is imagining the drone lifting off the ground and voilà – it does!

 

                        

Forget about voice controls or touchscreen gestures. Controlling a drone without your hands is the ultimate way to interface.  Spark your aerial creativity anywhere, and seize all your magical moments with UDrone.   

UDrone is easy to launch: concentrate and imagine the drone taking off. Once your concentration level is up to 150, the drone will whirr, rise, and buzz through the air with zero delays.  
                   
       
 
                                                 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 

Through a series of complex algorithms, we are able to integrate Brain-Computer Interface [BCI] technology, Somatosensory Interaction technology, and Image Recognition capabilities into one intelligent piece - UMind Lite, the brain-sensing hand band.

 

The headset has a number of sensors built in. There's an EEG, or electroencephalography sensor, which measures electrical activity in the brain. There's an EOG or electro-oculography sensor that measures eye movements by monitoring the electrical potential between the front and back of the human eye. There's an EMG, or electromyography sensor, that measures electrical activity in response to a nerve's stimulation of muscles. It also has gyros and accelerometers, and patented gear built in to amplify signal and squash noise from the finicky brain and nerve sensors.

The brain-sensing headband can read your brain waves, measure your brain electrical activity, track your slight facial movements, and convert these signals into instructions to control drone movements.

  • Hands-free flying with mind-and-gesture-controls and subject tracking
  • Powerful AI camera system with real-time image transmission 
  • Capture photos by blinking your eyes or with a “V” hand gesture 
  • Facial tracking allows drone camera to capture at a perfect angle
  • Auto-flight control system maintains stability during flying 
  • Three adjustable speed settings to accommodate the pilot’s preference 
  • Small, lightweight, portable, and fits perfectly in your backpack  

                            

Taking pictures is literally easy as a blink: blink your eyes twice, and the photo is captured. Its hands-free setting takes the shake out of the shot, making you look like a pro photographer.

 

    

UDrone features Gesture Recognition function, that you can shoot in Auto Mode when you make the Peace Sign. 

In addition, the powerful AI camera system of UDrone automatically adjusts camera focus, exposure, and position to ensure your face is ideally displayed in the frame. All you need to do is act naturally. 

You can adjust the altitude by imagining, adjust the flying direction by tilting your head left and right, and land the drone by biting your teeth.  

 ACTUAL FOOTAGE Shot by UDrone

Acutely sensitive to light and colors, the HD camera of UDrone captures stunning aerial images and videos. All UDrone images are consistently sharp and vivid with very little color aberration and distortion.

UDrone's camera features an f/2.8 wide-angle lens and a 1/3.2 inch Sony CMOS sensor, allowing you to shoot stabilized video at 1080P and stills at 8 MP.

 

 

        

Once the drone is up in the air, you can view the real-time camera feed on the UDrone app and sync footages shot onto your Android or IOS device instantly. 

 

Tracking a certain subject on the move or from different angles? You can initiate focus on the subject, and the camera will do the rest. Our advanced Subject Tracking Camera can even identify a certain person and record continuously with Auto-follow as the person moves in the crowd.
UDrone can add extra dimensions to your Vlogs. The drone can track and continually focus on you while you are moving, walking, or talking. With UDrone, Vloggers can create remarkable footages with a completely different perspective.
 

The Auto-Flight control system enables the drone to find the perfect balance in air pressure. This means that the drone can precisely hover in the midair to get that perfect shot video or selfie every time. And even with its compact size, the acceleration sensor with three rotors enables the drone to maintain stability in flight.

The Optical Flow technology is the distribution of apparent velocities of movement of brightness pattern in an image or the pattern of apparent motion of objects with the relative motion between an observer and a scene. Putting it in a simple way to understand the concept is the drone can detect the motion of movement to locate the subject and fly more balanced.  It is a feature that works by having a downward-facing camera “view” the ground surface while sending a continuous flow of optical feedback to the flight controller which then makes flight adjustments to keep the drone in its position.  As a result, the drone will take better photos than other drones.

The drone comes in three adjustable speed settings including indoor, outdoor, and open ground to accommodate different flying environments. Whether you are indoor or outdoor, on the road or at home, U-Drone can be a perfect add-on to your magical moments. 
Here are few ideas of how you can use it: attending concerts; home gatherings and house parties; hiking, jogging, and other outdoor activities; Youtube Vlogging; sightseeing, road trips, and traveling; interacting with your little ones; concentration training; or simply recording any small aspects of your daily!
 

 

 
 

Flying with your mobile device as the remote controller is an alternative option. The UDrone mobile APP allows you to command the drone conveniently and effortlessly. It only takes you a few minutes to learn the tricks of flying.  

For those who want a traditional manual control or in case you have not master operate the drone by your mind, you can always use APP to control it.

 

 

                                        

At the size of your palm, the 85g UDrone is extremely compact, lightweight, and portable. Its portability and convenience of use make it an excellent choice for hikers and travel photographers.

 

 

                                     

Compared with heavier drones in the market, UDrone generates less momentum during crashes, thanks to its crafted lightweight design and the protective bumpers, effectively preventing the drone from destruction in case of crashes.

 

  • Control with APP

U-Drone can fly for up to 60 meters away from your phone, and up to 60 meters above from the ground. For first time users, we recommend keeping the drone within 20 meters from you. 

  • Control with the headband UMind Lite 

When you command the drone with your mind, UDrone can fly for up to 20 meters away from you, and up to 2.5 meters above the ground. UDrone can fly for up to 25 minutes in one charge, giving you enough duration for daily use. The detachable battery allows you to charge on the go. The interchangeable battery takes less than 30 minutes to be fully charged.  
 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Powered by Longham Technology, EEG Smart has been determined to develop the world's leading bio-electric artificial intelligence wearable device. By embracing multiple bio-electrical application patents and critical algorithms, we are able to develop multiple software-hardware combined BMI (Brain-Machine Interface) system, which collects high-precision EEG data in real time. With the research outcomes of cognitive psychology, it analyzes people’s mental state such as fatigue, excitement, concentration, relaxation, alertness and etc. This provides commercialized solutions in bioinformatics sensors and artificial intelligence, for both health and entertainment areas.
 

As an experienced crowdfunding partner, we work closely with designers and manufacturers, to make sure we stick with our schedule. Despite the many procedures and challenges involved throughout the campaign, we will do our best to mitigate all risks associated with project planning, production, and shipments. There are also chances that backers of some countries may need to pay for customs duties, according to the country's laws and regulations. Should a problem come up during the process, we will definitely keep you in the loop.
story_txt:
The waiting is Over
                 Meet the drone can be controlled with Hands-free     
                                                 
Activate a drone with brain electrical impulses is NO longer science fiction!  Now with UDrone, all you need to do is imagining the drone lifting off the ground and voilà – it does!
 

                        Forget about voice controls or touchscreen gestures. Controlling a drone without your hands is the ultimate way to interface.  Spark your aerial creativity anywhere, and seize all your magical moments with UDrone.   UDrone is easy to launch: concentrate and imagine the drone taking off. Once your concentration level is up to 150, the drone will whirr, rise, and buzz through the air with zero delays.                            
                                                  
 


 
 

 


 



 


 
Through a series of complex algorithms, we are able to integrate Brain-Computer Interface [BCI] technology, Somatosensory Interaction technology, and Image Recognition capabilities into one intelligent piece - UMind Lite, the brain-sensing hand band.

 
The headset has a number of sensors built in. There's an EEG, or electroencephalography sensor, which measures electrical activity in the brain. There's an EOG or electro-oculography sensor that measures eye movements by monitoring the electrical potential between the front and back of the human eye. There's an EMG, or electromyography sensor, that measures electrical activity in response to a nerve's stimulation of muscles. It also has gyros and accelerometers, and patented gear built in to amplify signal and squash noise from the finicky brain and nerve sensors.

The brain-sensing headband can read your brain waves, measure your brain electrical activity, track your slight facial movements, and convert these signals into instructions to control drone movements.




Hands-free flying with mind-and-gesture-controls and subject tracking
Powerful AI camera system with real-time image transmission 
Capture photos by blinking your eyes or with a “V” hand gesture 


Facial tracking allows drone camera to capture at a perfect angle
Auto-flight control system maintains stability during flying 


Three adjustable speed settings to accommodate the pilot’s preference 
Small, lightweight, portable, and fits perfectly in your backpack  



                            Taking pictures is literally easy as a blink: blink your eyes twice, and the photo is captured. Its hands-free setting takes the shake out of the shot, making you look like a pro photographer.     UDrone features Gesture Recognition function, that you can shoot in Auto Mode when you make the Peace Sign. In addition, the powerful AI camera system of UDrone automatically adjusts camera focus, exposure, and position to ensure your face is ideally displayed in the frame. All you need to do is act naturally. You can adjust the altitude by imagining, adjust the flying direction by tilting your head left and right, and land the drone by biting your teeth.   ACTUAL FOOTAGE Shot by UDroneAcutely sensitive to light and colors, the HD camera of UDrone captures stunning aerial images and videos. All UDrone images are consistently sharp and vivid with very little color aberration and distortion.UDrone's camera features an f/2.8 wide-angle lens and a 1/3.2 inch Sony CMOS sensor, allowing you to shoot stabilized video at 1080P and stills at 8 MP.          Once the drone is up in the air, you can view the real-time camera feed on the UDrone app and sync footages shot onto your Android or IOS device instantly.  Tracking a certain subject on the move or from different angles? You can initiate focus on the subject, and the camera will do the rest. Our advanced Subject Tracking Camera can even identify a certain person and record continuously with Auto-follow as the person moves in the crowd.UDrone can add extra dimensions to your Vlogs. The drone can track and continually focus on you while you are moving, walking, or talking. With UDrone, Vloggers can create remarkable footages with a completely different perspective. 

The Auto-Flight control system enables the drone to find the perfect balance in air pressure. This means that the drone can precisely hover in the midair to get that perfect shot video or selfie every time. And even with its compact size, the acceleration sensor with three rotors enables the drone to maintain stability in flight.

The Optical Flow technology is the distribution of apparent velocities of movement of brightness pattern in an image or the pattern of apparent motion of objects with the relative motion between an observer and a scene. Putting it in a simple way to understand the concept is the drone can detect the motion of movement to locate the subject and fly more balanced.  It is a feature that works by having a downward-facing camera “view” the ground surface while sending a continuous flow of optical feedback to the flight controller which then makes flight adjustments to keep the drone in its position.  As a result, the drone will take better photos than other drones.

For those who want a traditional manual control or in case you have not master operate the drone by your mind, you can always use APP to control it.

Its portability and convenience of use make it an excellent choice for hikers and travel photographers.                                       Compared with heavier drones in the market, UDrone generates less momentum during crashes, thanks to its crafted lightweight design and the protective bumpers, effectively preventing the drone from destruction in case of crashes. Control with APPU-Drone can fly for up to 60 meters away from your phone, and up to 60 meters above from the ground. story:
Welcome to RHEEA Tech’s In-Demand Plan for PISA Light  

    Many of us follow the practice of carrying keychain flashlight wherever we go. But, the problem we face is that those tiny button cell batteries that generally power our flashlight are to be replaced frequently. In some instances, it takes very longer for us to replace the old button cell batteries as they are too small.

-Tough job for your big hand to work on such tiny battery.

    Can you imagine carrying a keychain flashlight that is just equivalent to the size of a paper clip that comes with rechargeable battery? Yes, such a light called as PISA light in attractive colors is launched by us at RHEEA Tech. Welcome to our Kickstarter Campaign for this small colorful rechargeable EDC flashlight. This practical, trendy and minimal light is not just a light. It is in fact, a stylish and the most useful modern accessory for carrying along every day. 

 

What is Pisa Light

    At RHEEA Tech, we have meticulously crafted this small light. This miniature light is most elegantly designed. The small size will make it your best companion besides ensuring your safety during darkness. We are happy to share that we have taken your convenience to the next level by creating this light as a rechargeable light. So, you can save your money on frequently changing the battery. As it comes with a keychain, you can 
just attach your keys that you should carry along with you.

-PISA LIGHT is designed  both a trendy accessory and a practical EDC item.

    At RHEEA Tech, we have meticulously crafted this small light. This miniature light is most elegantly designed. The small size will make it your best companion besides ensuring your safety during darkness.

-You Never Know When You Need Light Urgently. 

      We are happy to share that we have taken your convenience to the next level by creating this light as a rechargeable light. So, you can save your money on frequently changing the battery. As it comes with a keychain, you can just attach your keys that you should carry along with you.     You can recharge this gadget on your mobile phone using a USB cable. Even, you can charge it on a power socket using your mobile adapter or on your computer. The colorful designs will make it the best companion if you are highly particular about your style.

User Friendly, Stylish Design, It's PISA Light

Excellent and Attractive Set of Features:  

   This key chain light will turn out to be special as against other such lights available in the market because of its excellent set of features. Here, let us introduce the features:  

-It's A Light For Night Time, And Is A Decoration In Day Time. 

Powerful Brightness:   

    You can compare the brightness provided by other such tiny lights that come with 4 button cell batteries. Yes, our light will bring you 5 lm additional brightness without requiring you to change the button cell batteries that cost you more. Yes, when normal flash lights bring you 10 lm as the utmost brightness, you will get 15 lm brightness from PISA. 

-15 lm is powerful for such a small light.

Water Resistance:  

In some instances, you might get caught in the rain when you carry the light. To make sure that the rain does not affect the brightness of the light, we at RHEEA Tech have designed this light as a water resistant flash light. So, you can stay confident about having a companion even in rainy season when power outages are common to happen.

-Water Resistance Is Necessary For Outdoor Using.

Small Size and Light Weight:  

In addition to being smaller in appearance, the light is also designed as a lightweight model. Most people do not want to carry a heavy and large flashlight. We have rightly understood this requirement and so we have managed the technical limitation of size of rechargeable flashlight. Yes, this is the world’s smallest rechargeable flashlight at the present situation. Even though you carry it along with you wherever you go, you will never feel it.

-PISA Is The World's Smallest Flashlight Now.

Charging Indicator:  

This small flash light comes with a charging indicator. This will ensure that the light is not over charged or undercharged. Yes, charging indicator is attractively designed in such a small body by our technicians. Once charged, the indicator light will switch off automatically.

-Red Light Indicator Built In. 

Rechargeable: 

    This is a feature that is highly worthy. With this feature, you need not have to spend on costly button cell batteries that small flash lights generally come with. 

-Micro USB Input, The Same To Most Smartphone

Specification

Product Materials: Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy
Light Sources:       Nichia 5mm white light LED 
Size:                      Ø12mm*39mm 
Weight:                  8 grams Beam 
Distance:               10 meters  
Power Sources:     70 mAh, Lithium Polymer  
Runtime:                Approx 5 hours
Water resistance:   IPX4
Features:               Switch On/Off by rotating.
                              Charging Indicator   
Protection:             Overcharge, Over-Discharge, Over Voltage,
                              Over-current, and Low Voltage Cut-Off.

-Size Comparison

Colors: 

Our Development
2 Years Hard Working on PISA LIGHT 

It's not a problem to design a new rechargeable flashlight. However, making it as small as regular mini flashlight with button cell is really A BIG CHALLENGE! There are LED, Battery, Wires, Charger, Electronic Circuits, Spring...etc. in such a small cavity, no space can be wasted. RHEEA Team finally get over the difficulty without quality sacrificed, well, even better.  

-So Many Parts Jammed Into Such A Small Cavity.

 - Initial Prototype

 -Prototype Of Final Version

    Physical appearance design is a very interesting process. Decades of deigns was born before the final one, even some of them are very unique. It's a hard work to generate so many design, and it's even harder to choose one that every one loves among so many designs.

-Some Ideas were quite unique

-Final Design

    2 years of hard working on PISA Light, we believe PISA LIGHT will be the new gadget you most want to have.
    Back Us, Get your PISA Light before others in the world.

***Patent pending*** 

Status

    The Rheea Tech Team has spent 2 years to finalize the attractive design, minimize the size. At last, we created prototype samples and test them repeatably. 
    We have successfully reach the funding goal on Kickstarter on 1/22, and started create tooling on 1/23, pilot run before 2/15.
2/15 is Chinese New Year EVE, and rest process started on 3/1, and Kickstarter lot will be sent before ending of March.
Indiegogo In Demand plan lot will be shipped in April, 2018. 

Thank you for your support.
